title: The Matrix
plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

4738066 4739692 - What did you see?
- What happened?
4741111 4743279 A black cat went past us...
4743530 4745370 and then another that looked just like it.

4745407 4746949 How much like it?
Was it the same cat?
4748168 4749624 It might have been. I'm not sure.
4756058 4758124 A déjà vu is usually a glitch in the Matrix.
4758148 4760128 It happens when they change something.

4772976 4774769 They cut the hard line.
It's a trap! Get out!

4821768 4824504 That's what they changed. We're
trapped. There's no way out.
4824528 4826488 Be calm. Give me your phone.
4826613 4828155 They'll be able to track it.
4831968 4835618 Tank, find a structural drawing of this building. Find it fast.
4843463 4846048 - Got it! - I need the main wet-wall.

4861732 4863858 I hope the Oracle
gave you some good news.

4996491 4998409 - We can't leave him!
- We have to!

5029441 5033277 The great Morpheus.
We meet at last.
5039075 5041118 You all look the same to me.
5111273 5113083 - Operator. - Yeah, I need an exit, fast.

5115193 5118112 There was an accident.
Goddamn car accident.
5120490 5121865 Somebody up there still likes me.
5123868 5125786 G- get me out of here. Fast.

5126037 5128706 Nearest exit, Franklin and Erie.
An old TV repair shop.
5138216 5140216 Yes. They're moving him. I don't know where to yet.
5140343 5142636 He's alive. We need an exit.
5145640 5147725 - I sent him to Franklin and Erie. - Got it.
5200820 5202988 I don't know. It just went dead.
5244447 5247324 I thought I was in love with you.
5254207 5256583 Too bad things had to turn out this way.

5265427 5268262 tired of fighting.
I'm tired of this ship...

5268596 5273225 of being cold, of eating
the same goddamn goop every day.
5277147 5280524 I'm tired of that jack-off and all of his bullshit.
5283486 5285696 I bet you never saw this coming...
5289284 5291660 God, I wish I could be there...

5294789 5297958 I wish I could walk in
just when it happens...
5307969 5309970 If you had told us the truth...

5310221 5313098 we would've told you to shove
that red pill up your ass!

5313349 5315476 That is not true, Cypher.
He set us free.
5321024 5323525 All I do is what he tells me to do.

5325111 5328030 If I had to choose between
that and the Matrix...
5336831 5339416 can be more real than this world.
5341586 5344087 All I do is pull the plug here.
5356258 5358264 Welcome to the real world, huh, baby?
5360328 5362008 Oh no. That's what you think.
5364869 5367528 And when I wake up, I won't remember a goddamn thing.

5369030 5371990 if you have anything
terribly important to say to Switch...

5373868 5376870 - No, please don't.
- Not like this.

5392554 5395722 And right now,
I'm going to prove it to you.

5399018 5400894 there's no way
I can pull this plug.
5405567 5408151 some kind of a miracle to stop me.
5410154 5412239 I mean, how can he be the One...

5420123 5423333 Come on.
All I want is a little yes or no.

5442645 5447399 Believe it or not, you piece of shit,
you're still going to burn!

5475261 5477554 - You're hurt.
- I'll be all right.
5499786 5502162 Have you ever stood and stared at it?
5522141 5525018 Did you know that the first Matrix...

5525269 5529940 was designed to be a perfect
human world where none suffered...

5535655 5539991 No one would accept the program.
Entire crops were lost.

5542870 5547249 we lacked the programming language
to describe your perfect world.

5550828 5554388 human beings define
their reality through misery...
5556338 5558688 So the perfect world was a dream...

5558748 5564138 that your primitive cerebrum
kept trying to wake up from.

5565476 5569146 Which is why the Matrix was
redesigned to this.

5575528 5579894 because as soon as we started thinking
for you, it really became our civilization...

5579918 5583468 which is, of course,
what this is all about.
5600052 5603972 The future is our world, Morpheus.

5613024 5616401 - What are they doing to him?
- They're breaking into his mind.

5616652 5618820 It's like hacking a computer.
All it takes is time.

5620531 5623658 Depends on the mind.
But eventually, it'll crack...

5623910 5628330 and his alpha patterns
will change from this to this.

5628581 5631541 When it does, Morpheus will tell them
anything they want to know.

5633085 5637130 The leader of every ship is given
codes to Zion's mainframe computer.

5637381 5640300 If an agent got the codes
and got into Zion's mainframe...

5640548 5643268 they could destroy us.
We can't let that happen.
5643488 5646048 Trinity, Zion's more important than me...

5652647 5654487 Well, there has to be
something that we can do.
5654732 5656733 There is. We pull the plug.
5663616 5665242 We don't have any other choice.

5672041 5674960 Never send a human
to do a machine's job.
5675208 5677148 If indeed the insider has failed...

5677208 5680568 they'll sever the connection
as soon as possible, unless --

5682635 5686179 Then we have no choice, but continue
as planned. Deploy the sentinels.

5692770 5695438 Morpheus, you were more
than a leader to us.
5711372 5712732 I don't believe this is happening.

5712874 5714916 - Neo, this has to be done.
- Does it?

5717418 5720065 - This can't be just coincidence. It can't be.
- What are you talking about?
5721591 5723383 She told me this would happen.

5723801 5727971 She told me that I would
have to make a choice.

5732643 5735145 - What are you doing?
- I'm going in.

5735479 5737814 - No, you're not.
- I have to.

5738024 5741651 Neo, Morpheus sacrificed himself
so that we could get you out.

5741903 5743820 There is no way
that you're going back in.

5744405 5747657 Morpheus did what he did because
he believed I'm something I'm not.

5752914 5755874 - The Oracle hit me with that too.
- No, you have to be.

5756125 5758793 I'm sorry, I'm not.
I'm just another guy.

5767648 5772064 Neo, this is loco. They've got Morpheus
in a military-controlled building.

5772088 5776568 Even if you somehow got inside, those
are agents holding him. Three of them.

5777605 5781524 I want Morpheus back too, but
what you're talking about is suicide.
5781776 5783360 I know that's what it looks like...
5784820 5787197 I can't explain to you why it's not.

5790128 5793828 And he was ready to give his life for
what he believed. I understand that now.
5794248 5795664 That's why I have to go.

5795688 5798041 - Why?
- Because I believe in something.
5800544 5802253 I believe I can bring him back.

5819228 5821568 - What are you doing?
- Going with you.
5824610 5826736 Let me tell you what I believe.

5827238 5829614 I believe Morpheus means more
to me than he does to you.

5829948 5833908 I believe if you are really serious about
saving him, you are going to need my help.

5834488 5836844 And since I am the ranking
officer on this ship...

5836868 5839666 if you don't like it,
I believe you can go to hell.
5840418 5842836 Because you aren't going anywhere else.

5855725 5859019 I'd like to share
a revelation that I've had...

5861230 5865233 It came to me when I tried
to classify your species...

5875286 5880206 instinctively develops a natural
equilibrium with the surrounding environment.

5882835 5886379 You move to an area
and you multiply...

5886630 5891134 and multiply until every
natural resource is consumed.
5891468 5893748 The only way you can survive...
5893846 5896806 is to spread to another area.

5902228 5905228 There is another organism
on this planet that...
5907943 5909611 Do you know what it is?
5925002 5926419 Okay, so what do you need?

5944855 5947398 No one has ever done
anything like this.
5948609 5950527 That's why it's going to work.

5957159 5959452 Perhaps we're asking
the wrong questions.

5979557 5982267 They're coming for you.
They're coming.

6005541 6008710 this reality,
whatever you want to call it.
6008961 6011254 I can't stand it any longer.
6015259 6017135 If there is such a thing.

6027813 6031441 And every time I do, I fear that
I have somehow been infected by it.
6037156 6039449 I must get out of here.
6042328 6045205 And in this mind is the key.

6047374 6050251 Once Zion is destroyed,
there is no need for me to be here.
6054048 6056382 I have to get inside Zion...
6056717 6059219 and you have to tell me how.

6084119 6087247 Please remove any metallic items
you're carrying. Keys, loose change.
6300961 6303463 I think they're trying to save him.

6428672 6430172 - How did you do that?
- Do what?

6430591 6434510 You moved like they do.
I've never seen anyone move that fast.
6447368 6450898 Tank, I need a pilot program for a B-212 helicopter.

6529981 6532608 Morpheus, get up.
Get up, get up.
6570647 6571689 He's not going to make it.
6710662 6712872 Do you believe it now, Trinity?

6720922 6723299 - She told me I...
- She told you...
6723675 6725259 exactly what you needed to hear.

6727929 6730890 Neo, sooner or later you'll
realize, just as I did...

6731224 6733517 there's a difference
between knowing the path...
6740728 6743428 - Goddamn, it's good to hear your voice, sir. - We need an exit.

6743528 6746728 Got one ready. Subway station,
State and Balboa.

6759377 6761795 - Damn it!
- The trace was completed.

6762047 6765633 - We have their position.
- Sentinels are standing by.
6810595 6812888 Neo, I want to tell you something...

6816142 6820104 but I'm afraid of
what it could mean if I do.

6823692 6826986 Everything the Oracle
told me has come true.
6943353 6946355 I'm going to enjoy watching you die...
7080615 7083617 That is the sound of inevitability.
7086204 7089539 It is the sound of your death.

7131958 7134167 - What happened?
- I don't know. I lost him.

7152312 7154563 - How long?
- Five, maybe six minutes.

7159027 7162070 - We can't use that until he's out.
- I know. Don't worry.
7166701 7169578 What the shit? That's my phone!

7173958 7176251 Got him!
He's on the run.
7176502 7179171 Mr. Wizard, get me out of here!
7179422 7181298 I got an old exit. Wabash and Lake.
7305590 7308717 The fire escape at the end of the alley, room 303.
7444288 7447188 that I would fall in love, and that, that man...
7448068 7450708 the man that I loved would be the One.
7684635 7688263 I know that you're afraid. You're afraid of us.
7693394 7695979 I didn't come here to tell you how this is going to end.
7696230 7699190 I came here to tell you how it's going to begin.
7701986 7705071 And then I'll show these people what you don't want them to see.
7705322 7707198 I'm going to show them a world...
7709493 7713121 A world without rules and controls, without borders or boundaries.
7721297 7723256 is a choice I leave to you.

subtitles.author: dBE
lines: 50343 53763 - Is everything in place? - You're not to relieve me.
54013 56641 I know, but I felt like taking a shift.
57183 59561 You like him, don't you? You like watching him.
59811 62814 - Don't be ridiculous. - We're going to kill him.
70864 72949 - Did you hear that? - Hear what?
73158 74784 Are you sure this line is clean?

116785 118705 - Freeze! Police!
- Hands on your head!

145063 148274 Lieutenant, you were given
specific orders.

150860 155281 You give me that "juris-my-dick-tion"
crap, you can cram it up your ass.
155740 158243 The orders were for your protection.
159744 161955 I think we can handle one little girl.

170922 174050 No, lieutenant, your men
are already dead.

207125 209210 Morpheus, the line was traced.
I don't know how.
209460 211087 I know. They cut the hard line.
211296 213464 There's no time. Get to another exit.
219554 221931 There's a phone at Wells and Lake.
324075 326077 Get up, Trinity. Just get up.
380506 382266 We have the name of their next target.

521439 524317 You're my savior.
My own personal Jesus Christ.

526694 528821 I know. This never happened.
You don't exist.
532283 534327 You look a little whiter than usual.

540625 545171 Ever have that feeling where you're
not sure if you're awake or dreaming?

545963 548716 All the time.
It's called mescaline.
549217 551344 It's the only way to fly.

552220 554722 It just sounds like you
need to unplug.

557892 561646 What do you think, Dujour?
Should we take him with us?
565107 568194 No, I can't. I have work tomorrow.
613531 614699 How do you know that name?
615533 617243 I know a lot about you.

618119 620204 - Who are you?
- My name is Trinity.
627586 629046 That was a long time ago.
639307 641517 That was you on my computer.
643894 646605 Right now, all I can tell you...

649233 651652 - I brought you here to warn you.
- Of what?
660411 662246 I know why you're here, Neo.
663039 664999 I know what you've been doing.
665249 667126 I know why you hardly sleep...

667418 670546 ...why you live alone and why,
night after night...

676635 679638 I know, because I was once
looking for the same thing.

682892 685978 ...he told me I wasn't really
looking for him...
689273 692401 It's the question that drives us, Neo.

693069 695738 It's the question
that brought you here.
704372 706832 The answer is out there, Neo.

733651 736487 You have a problem with authority,
Mr. Anderson.

736737 740783 You believe that you are special,
that the rules do not apply to you.

746455 749333 This is one of the top
software companies in the world...

749583 752962 ...because employees understand
they are part of a whole.

753212 757842 Thus, if an employee has a problem,
the company has a problem.

760094 763305 The time has come to make
a choice, Mr. Anderson.

764181 768060 Either you choose to be at your desk
on time from this day forth...
768686 771272 ...or you choose to find another job.
817735 821071 Hello, Neo. Do you know who this is?
827578 830748 I don't know if you're ready to see what I want to show you.
830998 834168 But unfortunately, you and I have run out of time.
834418 838130 They're coming for you, and I don't know what they're going to do.
863572 866909 I don't know. If you don't want to find out, get out of there.
868327 871497 I can guide you, but you must do exactly as I say.
871705 874375 - Okay. - The cubicle across from you is empty.
877503 879630 - But what if they... - Go. Now.
895980 898732 When I tell you, go to the end of the row...
898983 900943 ...to the office at the end of the hall.
921380 924925 Good. Now, outside there is a scaffold.
927636 929972 - How do you know this? - We don't have time.
930222 933058 To your left there's a window. Go to it.
939732 942318 No way! No way! This is crazy!
942568 944945 There are two ways out of this building.
945195 948991 One is that scaffold. The other is in their custody.
949241 952453 You take a chance either way. I leave it to you.
958959 960836 Why is this happening to me?

963130 965883 I'm nobody.
I didn't do anything.

1069862 1074700 As you can see, we've had our eye on
you for some time now, Mr. Anderson.
1075993 1078662 It seems that you've been living...

1082458 1084960 In one life,
you're Thomas A. Anderson...

1085210 1088547 ...program writer for
a respectable software company.

1089590 1092885 You have a social security number.
You pay your taxes.

1096180 1099808 ...help your landlady
carry out her garbage.
1102311 1105439 The other life is lived in computers...

1105731 1108692 ...where you go by
the hacker alias "Neo"...

1108942 1113739 ...and are guilty of virtually every
computer crime we have a law for.
1119411 1121413 And one of them does not.

1125125 1128962 I'm going to be as forthcoming
as I can be, Mr. Anderson.

1137513 1140516 We know that you've been contacted
by a certain...

1148524 1152528 Whatever you think you know
about this man is irrelevant.
1152778 1155197 He is considered by many authorities...
1155447 1158492 ...to be the most dangerous man alive.

1162871 1165791 ...believe that I am wasting
my time with you.

1166083 1169503 But I believe you wish
to do the right thing.
1169795 1173298 We're willing to wipe the slate clean...

1176301 1179221 All we're asking in return
is your cooperation...

1179471 1182975 ...in bringing
a known terrorist to justice.
1186895 1188981 That sounds like a really good deal.
1190607 1192359 But I got a better one.
1199116 1201118 ...and you give me my phone call.

1210627 1213255 You can't scare me
with this gestapo crap.

1259301 1261511 You're going to help us,
Mr. Anderson...
1322614 1325867 This line is tapped, so I must be brief.
1326118 1330414 They got to you first, but they've underestimated how important you are.

1335752 1339464 What are you talking about?
What is happening to me?
1339715 1344553 You are the One, Neo. You may have spent the last few years...
1344803 1347764 ...looking for me, but I've spent my entire life...
1351059 1353228 Now, do you still want to meet?
1354187 1357065 - Yes. - Then go to the Adams Street bridge.

1381840 1384384 It's necessary, Neo.
For our protection.
1397147 1399149 We don't have time for 20 Questions.
1399649 1402027 Right now, there's only one rule:
1414581 1417042 Please, Neo, you have to trust me.

1417626 1420253 - Why?
- Because you have been down there.
1423215 1424841 You know exactly where it ends.

1427052 1429304 And I know that's
not where you want to be.

1447531 1449699 Lie back.
Lift up your shirt.

1480230 1482482 - You're gonna lose it.
- No, I'm not.
1532866 1535327 Let me give you one piece of advice.
1539539 1541750 He knows more than you can imagine.
1555639 1557557 As you no doubt have guessed...
1560101 1561686 It's an honor to meet you.

1585627 1588380 ...that right now you're feeling
a bit like Alice...
1595345 1597973 I can see it in your eyes.

1598556 1601851 You have the look of a man
who accepts what he sees...

1605772 1608358 Ironically, this is not
far from the truth.
1609067 1611444 Do you believe in fate, Neo?

1614406 1617200 I don't like the idea that
I'm not in control of my life.
1618285 1621621 I know exactly what you mean.
1625917 1628295 Let me tell you why you're here.

1631423 1633049 What you know,
you can't explain.
1635719 1637637 You felt it your entire life:

1638221 1642392 Something's wrong with the world.
You don't know what, but it's there.
1642892 1645103 Like a splinter in your mind...

1648148 1650900 It is this feeling
that has brought you to me.

1653445 1655280 Do you know what
I'm talking about?
1671546 1673506 Even now, in this very room.

1674341 1676551 You can see it when you
look out your window...
1676801 1679137 ...or when you turn on your television.
1679554 1682098 You can feel it when you go to work...

1688938 1691858 It is the world that has been
pulled over your eyes...

1704454 1706748 Like everyone else,
you were born into bondage...

1706998 1711669 ...born into a prison that you cannot
smell or taste or touch.
1730146 1732023 You have to see it for yourself.
1744077 1746413 After this, there is no turning back.

1748665 1751709 ...the story ends, you wake up
in your bed and believe...

1758049 1760760 ...and I show you how deep
the rabbit hole goes.

1772689 1775733 ...all I'm offering is the truth.
Nothing more.

1828495 1830497 The pill you took is
part of a trace program.

1831247 1835877 It disrupts your carrier signals
so we can pinpoint your location.

1838046 1840215 It means buckle your
seat belt, Dorothy...

1893476 1897564 Have you ever had a dream, Neo,
that you were so sure was real?

1899023 1901609 What if you were unable
to wake from that dream?

1901859 1904362 How would you know the difference
between the dream world...
1926509 1928177 Tank, we'll need a signal soon.

1929679 1932348 - I got a fibrillation.
- Apoc, location.

1939022 1941524 - Lock. I got him!
- Now, Tank, now!

2127418 2130213 - I hope you're right.
- I don't have to hope.
2155238 2156656 He still needs a lot of work.

2159534 2161744 Your muscles atrophied.
We're rebuilding them.

2261385 2264138 I can't tell you exactly
what year it is...

2266515 2269352 There's nothing I can say
that will explain it for you.
2269602 2272355 Come with me. See for yourself.

2291958 2295711 ...where we broadcast our pirate signal
and hack into the Matrix.
2299090 2302259 Most of my crew you already know.

2313813 2317525 The ones you don't know:
Tank and his big brother, Dozer.
2318401 2320820 The little one behind you is Mouse.

2325157 2328411 You wanted to know
what the Matrix is?
2358149 2359984 This will feel a little weird.
2378002 2380463 We can load anything, from clothing...

2391891 2394310 Right now we're inside
a computer program?
2394602 2396520 Is it really so hard to believe?

2397021 2399648 Your clothes are different.
The plugs in your body are gone.

2403319 2406655 Your appearance now is what we call
"residual self-image."

2407364 2409992 It is the mental projection
of your digital self.

2421712 2423631 If you're talking about
what you can feel...
2423881 2426300 ...what you can smell, taste and see...

2426550 2430429 ...then "real" is simply electrical
signals interpreted by your brain.
2434600 2437019 This is the world that you know.

2438437 2441482 The world as it was at the end
of the 20th century.

2443859 2448197 It exists now only as part of
a neural-interactive simulation...

2454245 2457039 You've been living
in a dream world, Neo.

2483065 2485442 We have only bits and pieces
of information.

2485693 2489488 But what we know for certain
is that in the early 21st century...

2489738 2492992 ...all of mankind was united
in celebration.

2493242 2497997 We marveled at our own magnificence
as we gave birth to AI.

2502585 2507006 A singular consciousness that spawned
an entire race of machines.

2507840 2511302 We don't know who struck first,
us or them.

2511719 2514930 But we know that it was us
that scorched the sky.
2516599 2518767 They were dependent on solar power...

2519018 2522354 ...and it was believed that
they would be unable to survive...

2522688 2526192 ...without an energy source
as abundant as the sun.

2526442 2531322 Throughout human history, we have
been dependent on machines to survive.

2532781 2536994 Fate, it seems, is not
without a sense of irony.

2540206 2544627 The human body generates more
bioelectricity than a 120-volt battery.
2544877 2549006 And over 25,000 BTUs of body heat.
2550925 2553093 Combined with a form of fusion...

2553427 2558265 ...the machines had found all the energy
they would ever need.

2562311 2566065 There are fields, Neo,
endless fields...

2566315 2569568 ...where human beings
are no longer born.

2578160 2580746 For the longest time,
I wouldn't believe it.

2580996 2583666 And then I saw the fields
with my own eyes...

2586877 2590214 ...so they could be fed intravenously
to the living.

2590756 2595010 And standing there,
facing the pure, horrifying precision...

2595261 2598180 ...I came to realize
the obviousness of the truth.

2606230 2609608 The Matrix is a computer-generated
dream world...
2614655 2617825 ...in order to change a human being...

2627501 2632089 I didn't say it would be easy, Neo.
I just said it would be the truth.
2636093 2638012 Let me out! I want out!

2639972 2642641 - Easy, Neo. Easy.
- Get this thing out of me.
2642891 2644560 Get this thing out of me!
2677468 2679261 I can't go back, can I?

2692191 2695444 We never free a mind
once it's reached a certain age.
2697404 2699114 The mind has trouble letting go.
2699365 2701658 I've seen it before, and I'm sorry.
2702701 2704787 I did what I did because...

2715381 2719468 When the Matrix was first built,
there was a man born inside...

2719968 2723764 ...who had the ability
to change whatever he wanted...
2724139 2727059 ...to remake the Matrix as he saw fit.
2728811 2732272 It was he who freed the first of us...
2736235 2739321 As long as the Matrix exists...
2739655 2741740 ...the human race will never be free.

2751500 2754711 ...and that his coming would hail
the destruction of the Matrix...

2759550 2764179 That is why there are those of us who
spent our lives searching the Matrix...
2768517 2770602 I did what I did because...
2816815 2818734 I'm Tank. I'll be your operator.

2819193 2821612 - You don't have any...
- Holes? Nope.

2822529 2827242 Me and my brother, Dozer, are 100%
pure, old-fashioned, homegrown human.

2833332 2835792 - Zion?
- If the war was over tomorrow...

2839505 2842674 The last human city.
The only place we have left.

2847262 2850682 Deep underground near the Earth's core,
where it's still warm.

2852309 2854186 You live long enough,
you might see it.

2856438 2861276 Goddamn! I gotta tell you, I'm excited
to see what you're capable of...

2863779 2866532 We're not supposed to
talk about this, but...

2872329 2875040 We got a lot to do.
We gotta get to it.

2878961 2881880 We're supposed to start
with these programs first.

2882881 2886343 That's major boring shit.
Let's do something more fun.
2914329 2916665 "Hey, Mikey, I think he likes it."

2936476 2938645 Ten hours straight.
He's a machine.

2957706 2960500 ...similar to the programmed reality
of the Matrix.

2960751 2963086 It has the same basic rules.
Like gravity.

2963337 2966798 These rules are no different
than those of a computer system.
2967341 2968842 Some of them can be bent.

3118867 3122537 ...has anything to do
with my muscles in this place?

3157239 3159449 His neuro-kinetics
are way above normal.

3185308 3188103 Come on! Stop trying to hit me,
and hit me!
3201324 3203451 I know what you're trying to do.
3205120 3207289 I'm trying to free your mind, Neo.
3207622 3209708 But I can only show you the door.
3210292 3212127 You have to walk through it.

3228226 3230937 You have to let it all go, Neo.
Fear...

3260508 3263219 - No one's ever made their first jump.
- I know.

3264554 3267015 - But what if he does?
- He won't.
3273396 3276191 Free my mind. No problem. Right.

3325073 3327701 - I thought it wasn't real.
- Your mind makes it real.
3330954 3333206 If you're killed in the Matrix...
3335041 3337502 The body cannot live without the mind.

3367991 3371369 I don't remember you ever
bringing me dinner.

3374456 3377292 There is something about him,
isn't there?

3382005 3385675 ...if Morpheus is so sure,
why not take him to see the Oracle?

3386593 3389512 Morpheus will take him
when he's ready.
3399314 3400857 The Matrix is a system, Neo.

3404527 3406863 But when you're inside,
what do you see?

3411367 3413953 The very minds of the people
we are trying to save.

3414204 3417165 But until we do, these people are
a part of that system...

3420960 3424297 ...most of these people are not
ready to be unplugged.
3424547 3426132 And many of them are so inert...
3429052 3431763 ...that they will fight to protect it.

3433264 3437018 Were you listening to me or looking
at the woman in the red dress?

3451324 3455161 It's another training program
designed to teach you one thing:

3455787 3458206 If you are not one of us,
you are one of them.

3462293 3466589 They can move in and out of any
software still hardwired to their system.

3466965 3470343 That means that anyone
we haven't unplugged...

3479394 3482522 We have survived by hiding
and running from them...

3484649 3487610 They're guarding all the doors
and holding all the keys.

3487861 3490697 Sooner or later, someone will
have to fight them.
3492407 3493825 I won't lie to you, Neo.

3494284 3499122 Every single man or woman who
has fought an agent, has died.

3499372 3501749 But where they have failed,
you will succeed.

3503251 3505571 I've seen an agent punch
through a concrete wall.

3505795 3509382 Men have emptied entire clips at them
and hit nothing but air.

3509632 3514262 Yet their strength and speed are still
based in a world built on rules.

3515889 3519267 ...they will never be as strong
or as fast as you can be.

3531487 3534407 I'm trying to tell you
that when you're ready...

3560892 3563353 - Did Zion send the warning?
- No, another ship.

3571236 3574447 A sentinel. A killing machine
designed for one thing.

3618032 3620910 Disables any electrical system
in the blast radius.

3621077 3623371 It's the only weapon we have
against the machines.

3629168 3632297 - Where are we?
- Their old service and waste systems.

3634882 3637593 There used to be cities
that spanned hundreds of miles.

3638094 3640013 Now these sewers are
all that's left.
3685475 3687643 You scared the bejesus out of me.

3699405 3702575 - Do you always look at it encoded?
- Well, you have to.

3702825 3705912 The image translators work
for the construct program.

3706162 3709582 But there's way too much information
to decode the Matrix.

3709832 3712794 You get used to it.
I don't even see the code.
3713044 3716464 All I see is blonde, brunette, redhead.

3729394 3731479 Because right now I'm thinking
the same thing.

3731813 3735149 Actually, I've been thinking it
ever since I got here.

3737068 3740071 Why, oh, why didn't I take
the blue pill?

3757797 3760883 Degreasing engines and
killing brain cells.
3761884 3764095 So can I ask you something?
3767098 3768724 Did he tell you why he did it?
3783156 3785950 So you're here to save the world.

3787452 3789537 What do you say
to something like that?
3824739 3828159 Do we have a deal, Mr. Reagan?

3834832 3837585 I know that when I put it
in my mouth...

3837835 3840922 ...the Matrix is telling my brain
that it is...
3869534 3871452 I don't want to remember nothing.
3878084 3880086 And I want to be rich.

3895184 3897603 You get my body
back in a power plant...
3901732 3903734 Access codes to the Zion mainframe.
3903985 3906153 No. I told you, I don't know them.
3909115 3911117 I can get you the man who does.

3923754 3927216 Here you go, buddy.
Breakfast of champions.

3928551 3931345 Close your eyes, it feels
like you're eating runny eggs.
3933806 3935391 You know what it reminds me of?

3937226 3939562 Tastee Wheat. Did you
ever eat Tastee Wheat?

3940187 3941897 No, but technically,
neither did you.

3946068 3949322 ...how do the machines really know
what Tastee Wheat tasted like?

3951240 3954452 Maybe what I think Tastee Wheat
tasted like, actually tasted like...

3957121 3959957 That makes you wonder.
Take chicken, for example.

3960207 3962247 Maybe they didn't know
what to make it taste like...

3962460 3964503 ...which is why it tastes
like everything.

3969884 3972928 ...combined with synthetic aminos,
vitamins and minerals.

3974680 3977558 It doesn't have everything
the body needs.

3980311 3983397 I understand you've run through
the agent training program.
3984440 3986484 You know, I wrote that program.

3988319 3990279 - What did you think of her?
- Of who?

3990655 3993699 The woman in the red dress.
I designed her.

3997036 4000998 ...but if you'd like to meet her,
I can arrange a more personal milieu.
4001248 4002625 The digital pimp hard at work.

4002875 4005127 Pay no attention to
these hypocrites, Neo.

4008506 4011634 ...is to deny the very thing
that makes us human.
4015137 4016737 ...bring the ship up to broadcast depth.
4019350 4020768 I'm taking Neo to see her.

4035574 4038285 ...the "fasten seat belt"
and "no smoking" signs are on.
4038786 4042164 Sit back and enjoy your flight.
4083247 4084415 We'll be back in an hour.
4118908 4121410 I have these memories from my life.

4127750 4129960 That the Matrix cannot tell you
who you are.

4179051 4181470 So is this the same oracle
that made...

4183138 4187476 Yes. She's very old. She's been
with us since the beginning.
4196610 4198529 She would say she knows enough.

4203659 4206829 Try not to think of it
in terms of right and wrong.
4209123 4211000 She can help you to find the path.
4219049 4221260 That I would find the One.

4234398 4236525 I told you I can only
show you the door.
4237234 4239320 You have to walk through it.

4254043 4257838 Make yourself at home, Morpheus.
Neo, come with me.
4307721 4310265 Do not try and bend the spoon.

4313602 4317606 Instead, only try
to realize the truth.

4325614 4330077 Then you'll see that it is not the spoon
that bends. It is only yourself.
4346135 4347594 The Oracle will you see now.

4367781 4370659 Not quite what you
were expecting, right?
4380753 4382588 I'd ask you to sit down...

4385716 4388594 - And don't worry about the vase.
- What vase?
4395142 4397019 I said, don't worry about it.
4398187 4400147 I'll get one of my kids to fix it.

4404026 4407821 What's really going to bake
your noodle later on is...

4408155 4411116 ...would you still have broken it
if I hadn't said anything?
4420876 4423128 I can see why she likes you.

4430469 4433555 You know why Morpheus
brought you to see me.
4441021 4442773 Do you think you are the One?
4456662 4458622 I'll let you in on a little secret.

4460874 4464711 Being the One is just
like being in love.

4465420 4468298 No one can tell you you're in love.
You just know it...
4477391 4479476 ...I'd better have a look at you.

4498996 4503959 Now I'm supposed to say,
"Hmm, that's interesting, but..."

4507713 4511675 But you already know
what I'm going to tell you.

4513093 4516054 - I'm not the One.
- Sorry, kid.

4520601 4522895 ...but it looks like
you're waiting for something.
4528859 4531737 Your next life, maybe. Who knows?
4532321 4534573 That's the way these things go.

4561475 4563393 Are you sure you want
to hear this?
4570067 4572236 And no one, not you, not even me...

4577783 4582120 ...that he's going to sacrifice
his life to save yours.

4583664 4586333 You're going to
have to make a choice.

4586959 4590545 In the one hand,
you'll have Morpheus' life.

4591046 4593924 And in the other hand,
you'll have your own.
4595342 4597636 One of you is going to die.
4599721 4603016 Which one will be up to you.
4604393 4606311 I'm sorry, kiddo. I really am.

4609314 4612025 And I hate giving
good people bad news.

4616863 4619283 As soon as you
step outside that door...

4622369 4626164 You'll remember you don't believe
in any of this fate crap.
4626999 4629751 You're in control of your own life.

4638719 4642055 I promise, by the time
you're done eating it...

4738068 4739988 - What did you see?
- What happened?
4741113 4743281 A black cat went past us...

4756294 4760715 A déjà vu is usually a glitch in the
Matrix when they change something.

4772978 4774771 They cut the hard line.
It's a trap! Get out!

4821776 4824237 That's what they changed.
We're trapped.
4824488 4826364 Be calm. Give me your phone.
4826615 4828158 They'll be able to track it.
4832787 4835624 Find a structural drawing of this building. Find it fast.
4843465 4846051 - Got it! - I need the main wet-wall.

4861733 4863860 I hope the Oracle
gave you some good news.

4996493 4998411 - We can't leave him!
- We have to!

5029442 5033279 The great Morpheus.
We meet at last.
5039077 5041121 You all look the same to me.
5111274 5113109 - Operator. - I need an exit, fast.

5115195 5118114 There was an accident.
Goddamn car accident.
5120492 5121868 Somebody up there still likes me.
5123870 5125789 Just get me out of here fast.

5126039 5128708 Nearest exit, Franklin and Erie.
An old TV repair shop.
5138218 5140136 Yes. They're moving him. I don't know where.
5140345 5142639 He's alive. We need an exit.
5145642 5147727 - I sent him to Franklin and Erie. - Got it.
5200822 5202991 I don't know. It just went dead.
5244449 5247327 ...I thought I was in love with you.
5254208 5256586 Too bad things had to turn out this way.

5265428 5268264 ...tired of fighting.
I'm tired of this ship...

5268598 5273227 ...of being cold, of eating
the same goddamn goop every day.
5277148 5280526 ...I'm tired of that jackoff and all of his bullshit.
5283488 5285698 I bet you never saw this coming...
5289285 5291663 God, I wish I could be there...

5294791 5297961 I wish I could walk in
just when it happens...
5307971 5309973 If you had told us the truth...

5310223 5313101 ...we would've told you to shove
that red pill up your ass!

5313351 5315478 That is not true, Cypher.
He set us free.
5321025 5323528 All I do is what he tells me to do.

5325113 5328032 If I had to choose between
that and the Matrix...
5336833 5339419 ...can be more real than this world.
5341587 5344090 All I do is pull the plug here.
5356269 5359230 - Welcome to the real world. - But you're out, Cypher.
5359480 5361899 - You can't go back. - That's what you think.
5363901 5367530 I go back to sleep. When I wake up, I won't remember a thing.

5369032 5371993 ...if you have anything important
to say to Switch...

5373828 5376873 - No, please don't.
- Not like this.

5392555 5395725 And right now,
I'm going to prove it to you.

5399020 5400897 ...there's no way
I can pull this plug.
5405568 5408154 ...some kind of a miracle to stop me.
5410156 5412241 I mean, how can he be the One...

5420124 5423336 Come on. All I want
is a little yes or no.

5442647 5447401 Believe it or not, you piece of shit,
you're still going to burn!

5475263 5477557 - You're hurt.
- I'll be all right.
5499787 5502165 Have you ever stood and stared at it?
5522143 5525021 Did you know that the first Matrix...

5525271 5529942 ...was designed to be a perfect
human world where none suffered...

5535656 5539994 No one would accept the program.
Entire crops were lost.

5542872 5547251 ...we lacked the programming language
to describe your perfect world.

5550630 5554467 ...human beings define
their reality through misery...
5556344 5559055 So the perfect world was a dream...

5559305 5564143 ...that your primitive cerebrum
kept trying to wake up from.

5565478 5569148 Which is why the Matrix was
redesigned to this.

5575529 5579659 ...because when we started thinking
for you, it became our civilization...

5579909 5582995 ...which is, of course,
what this is all about.
5600054 5603975 The future is our world, Morpheus.

5613025 5616404 - What are they doing to him?
- They're breaking into his mind.

5616654 5618823 It's like hacking a computer.
All it takes is time.

5620533 5623661 Depends on the mind.
But eventually, it'll crack...

5623911 5628332 ...and his alpha patterns
will change from this to this.

5628582 5631544 When it does, he'll tell them
anything they want to know.

5633087 5637133 The leader of every ship is given
codes to Zion's mainframe computer.

5637383 5640303 If an agent got the codes
and got into Zion's mainframe...

5640553 5643639 ...they could destroy us.
We can't let that happen.
5643806 5646058 Trinity, Zion's more important than me...

5652648 5654317 There has to be
something we can do.
5654734 5656736 There is. We pull the plug.

5672043 5674962 Never send a human
to do a machine's job.

5677214 5680426 ...they'll sever the connection
as soon as possible, unless...

5682636 5686182 We have no choice. Continue as planned.
Deploy the sentinels.

5692772 5695441 Morpheus, you were more
than a leader to us.
5711374 5712734 I don't believe this is happening.

5712875 5714919 - Neo, this has to be done.
- Does it?

5717421 5719882 - This can't be just coincidence.
- What?
5721592 5723386 She told me this would happen.

5723803 5727973 She told me that I would
have to make a choice.

5732645 5735147 - What are you doing?
- I'm going in.

5735481 5737817 - No, you're not.
- I have to.

5738025 5741654 Neo, Morpheus sacrificed himself
so that we could get you out.

5741904 5743823 There is no way
that you're going back in.

5744407 5747660 Morpheus did what he did because
he believed I'm something I'm not.

5752915 5755876 - The Oracle hit me with that too.
- No, you have to be.

5756127 5758796 I'm sorry, I'm not.
I'm just another guy.

5768347 5771684 This is loco. They've got Morpheus
in a military-controlled building.

5771934 5776313 Even if you somehow got inside, those
are agents holding him. Three of them.

5777606 5781527 I want Morpheus back too, but
what you're talking about is suicide.
5784822 5787199 I can't explain to you why it's not.

5788284 5791996 Morpheus believed something, and
he was ready to give his life for it.

5792246 5795249 I understand that now.
That's why I have to go.

5795541 5798043 - Why?
- Because I believe in something.
5800546 5802256 I believe I can bring him back.

5819231 5821150 - What are you doing?
- Going with you.
5824612 5826739 Let me tell you what I believe.

5827239 5829617 Morpheus means more to me
than he does to you.

5829950 5834246 I believe if you are serious about
saving him, you will need my help.
5834497 5836540 And since I am the ranking officer...

5836790 5839668 ...if you don't like it,
I believe you can go to hell.
5840419 5842838 Because you aren't going anywhere else.

5855726 5859021 I'd like to share
a revelation that I've had...

5861232 5865236 It came to me when I tried
to classify your species...

5875287 5880209 ...instinctively develops an equilibrium
with the surrounding environment.

5882836 5886382 You move to an area
and you multiply...

5886632 5891136 ...and multiply until every
natural resource is consumed.
5891470 5893556 The only way you can survive...

5902231 5905109 There is another organism
on this planet...
5907945 5909613 Do you know what it is?
5925004 5926422 Okay, so what do you need?

5944857 5947401 No one has ever done
anything like this.
5948611 5950529 That's why it's going to work.

5957161 5959455 Perhaps we're asking
the wrong questions.

5979558 5982269 They're coming for you.
They're coming.

6005542 6008712 ...this reality,
whatever you want to call it.
6008962 6011256 I can't stand it any longer.
6015260 6017137 If there is such a thing.

6027815 6031443 And every time I do, I fear that
I have somehow been infected by it.
6037157 6039451 I must get out of here.
6042329 6045207 And in this mind is the key.

6047376 6050254 Once Zion is destroyed,
there is no need for me to be here.
6054049 6056385 I have to get inside Zion...
6056719 6059221 ...and you have to tell me how.

6084121 6087249 Please remove any metallic items
you're carrying. Keys, loose change.
6300963 6303465 I think they're trying to save him.

6428673 6430175 - How did you do that?
- Do what?

6430592 6434513 You moved like they do.
I've never seen anyone move that fast.
6447734 6450904 I need a pilot program for a B-212 helicopter.

6529983 6532611 Morpheus, get up.
Get up, get up.
6570649 6571691 He's not going to make it.
6710663 6712874 Do you believe it now, Trinity?

6720924 6723301 - She told me...
- She told you...

6727931 6730892 Sooner or later you'll realize,
just as I did...

6731226 6733520 ...there's a difference
between knowing the path...
6740735 6743279 - It's good to hear your voice. - We need an exit.

6743530 6746324 Got one ready. Subway station,
State and Balboa.

6759379 6761798 - Damn it!
- The trace was completed.

6762048 6765635 - We have their position.
- Sentinels are standing by.
6810597 6812891 Neo, I want to tell you something...

6816144 6820106 ...but I'm afraid of
what it could mean if I do.

6823693 6826988 Everything the Oracle
told me has come true.
6943354 6946357 I'm going to enjoy watching you die...
7080616 7083619 That is the sound of inevitability.
7086205 7089542 It is the sound of your death.

7131959 7134170 - What happened?
- I don't know. I lost him.

7152313 7154565 - How long?
- Five, maybe six minutes.

7159028 7162073 - We can't use that until he's out.
- I know. Don't worry.
7166702 7169580 What the shit? That's my phone!
7173960 7176254 Got him! He's on the run.
7176504 7179173 Mr. Wizard, get me out of here!
7179423 7181300 I got an old exit. Wabash and Lake.
7305591 7308719 The fire escape at the end of the alley, room 303.

7444688 7450111 ...I'd fall in love, and that
the man I loved would be the One.
7684636 7688265 I know that you're afraid. You're afraid of us.
7693395 7695981 I didn't come here to tell you how this is going to end.
7696231 7699193 I came here to tell you how it's going to begin.
7701987 7705074 And then I'll show these people what you don't want them to see.
7705324 7707201 I'm going to show them a world...
7709495 7713123 A world without rules and controls, without borders or boundaries.
7721298 7723258 ...is a choice I leave to you.

subtitles.author: ChristopherCavco
lines: 3036 6239 CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY WARNER BROS.
49516 51484 YOU WEREN'T SUPPOSED TO RELIEVE ME.
51484 54587 I KNOW, BUT I FELT LIKE TAKING A SHIFT.
54587 57357 YOU LIKE HIM, DON'T YOU? YOU LIKE WATCHING HIM.
58658 60927 WE'RE GONNA KILL HIM. YOU UNDERSTAND THAT?
60927 63763 MORPHEUS BELIEVES HE IS THE ONE.
64664 66533 IT DOESN'T MATTER WHAT I BELIEVE.
70937 72839 ARE YOU SURE THIS LINE IS CLEAN?
115515 118885 HANDS ON YOUR HEAD! DO IT! DO IT NOW!
142175 146312 LIEUTENANT, YOU WERE GIVEN SPECIFIC ORDERS.
146312 148181 HEY, I'M JUST DOING MY JOB.
148181 151618 YOU GIVE ME THAT JURIS-MY-DICK-TION CRAP,
151618 153186 YOU CAN CRAM IT UP YOUR ASS.
153186 155755 THE ORDERS WERE FOR YOUR PROTECTION.
156723 159926 I THINK WE CAN HANDLE ONE LITTLE GIRL.
168501 171971 NO, LIEUTENANT. YOUR MEN ARE ALREADY DEAD.
207307 208908 Morpheus: I KNOW. THEY CUT THE HARD LINE.
208908 211477 THERE'S NO TIME. YOU'RE GOING TO HAVE TO GET TO ANOTHER EXIT.
217517 220186 THERE'S A PHONE AT WELLS AND LAKE.
321788 324223 GET UP, TRINITY. JUST GET UP.
378678 380513 WE HAVE THE NAME OF THEIR NEXT TARGET.
403903 406439 Massive Attack: ♪ YOU'RE NOT MY SAVIOR ♪
522688 524790 IF YOU GET CAUGHT USING THAT...
524790 527260 I KNOW. THIS NEVER HAPPENED. YOU DON'T EXIST.
530429 533566 YOU LOOK A LITTLE WHITER THAN USUAL.
538404 541674 YOU EVER HAVE THAT FEELING WHERE YOU'RE NOT SURE
541674 542909 IF YOU'RE AWAKE OR STILL DREAMING?
542909 546546 MMM, ALL THE TIME. IT'S CALLED MESCALINE.
546546 549048 IT'S THE ONLY WAY TO FLY.
549048 552552 HEY, IT SOUNDS TO ME LIKE YOU NEED TO UNPLUG, MAN.
552552 555321 YOU KNOW, GET SOME R & R?
557590 559125 SHOULD WE TAKE HIM WITH US?
562695 565898 NO. I CAN'T. I HAVE WORK TOMORROW.
581147 582949 Rob Zombie: ♪ DIG THROUGH THE DITCHES ♪
584684 589021 ♪ I SLAM IN THE BACK OF MY DRAGULA ♪
592358 597330 ♪ I SLAM IN THE BACK OF MY DRAGULA ♪
611510 612545 HOW DO YOU KNOW THAT NAME?
612545 615147 I KNOW A LOT ABOUT YOU.
621921 625057 THE TRINITY? THAT CRACKED THE IRS D-BASE?
625057 627059 THAT WAS A LONG TIME AGO.
635868 639538 THAT WAS YOU ON MY COMPUTER.
640940 644844 RIGHT NOW, ALL I CAN TELL YOU...
646612 648514 I BROUGHT YOU HERE TO WARN YOU.
657690 660026 I KNOW WHY YOU'RE HERE, NEO.
660026 662928 I KNOW WHAT YOU'VE BEEN DOING.
662928 666298 I KNOW WHY YOU HARDLY SLEEP, WHY YOU LIVE ALONE,
666298 670736 AND WHY, NIGHT AFTER NIGHT, YOU SIT AT YOUR COMPUTER.
673539 677576 I KNOW, BECAUSE I WAS ONCE LOOKING FOR THE SAME THING.
680479 683349 HE TOLD ME I WASN'T REALLY LOOKING FOR HIM.
684617 686318 I WAS LOOKING FOR AN ANSWER.
686318 690456 IT'S THE QUESTION THAT DRIVES US, NEO.
690456 693759 IT'S THE QUESTION THAT BROUGHT YOU HERE.
695361 698998 YOU KNOW THE QUESTION, JUST AS I DID.
701901 704804 THE ANSWER IS OUT THERE, NEO.
708074 711811 AND IT WILL FIND YOU IF YOU WANT IT TO.
730563 733766 YOU HAVE A PROBLEM WITH AUTHORITY, MR. ANDERSON.
733766 736335 YOU BELIEVE THAT YOU ARE SPECIAL,
736335 738704 THAT SOMEHOW THE RULES DO NOT APPLY TO YOU.
743309 746345 THIS COMPANY IS ONE OF THE TOP SOFTWARE COMPANIES
748981 750950 UNDERSTANDS THAT THEY ARE PART OF A WHOLE.
750950 753686 THUS, IF AN EMPLOYEE HAS A PROBLEM,
757590 761861 THE TIME HAS COME TO MAKE A CHOICE, MR. ANDERSON.
761861 763863 EITHER YOU CHOOSE TO BE AT YOUR DESK
763863 765931 ON TIME FROM THIS DAY FORTH,
765931 769401 OR YOU CHOOSE TO FIND YOURSELF ANOTHER JOB.
815548 818517 Morpheus: HELLO, NEO. DO YOU KNOW WHO THIS IS?
822087 825324 YES. I'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR YOU, NEO.
825324 828694 I DON'T KNOW IF YOU'RE READY TO SEE WHAT I WANT TO SHOW YOU,
828694 832198 BUT UNFORTUNATELY, YOU AND I HAVE RUN OUT OF TIME.
833933 836101 AND I DON'T KNOW WHAT THEY'RE GOING TO DO.
837703 840072 STAND UP AND SEE FOR YOURSELF.
859992 861460 WHAT THE HELL DO THEY WANT FROM ME?
861460 863195 I DON'T KNOW, BUT IF YOU DON'T WANT TO FIND OUT,
863195 865331 I SUGGEST YOU GET OUT OF THERE.
866498 869468 I CAN GUIDE YOU, BUT YOU MUST DO EXACTLY AS I SAY.
870402 872271 THE CUBICLE ACROSS FROM YOU IS EMPTY.
884016 886919 Morpheus: STAY HERE FOR JUST A MOMENT.
893492 896595 WHEN I TELL YOU, GO TO THE END OF THE ROW

5318613 5320982 ALL I DO IS WHAT HE TELLS ME TO DO.

5339367 5342070 ALL I DO IS PULL THE PLUG HERE.

5361589 5363725 I GO BACK TO SLEEP, AND WHEN I WAKE UP,
5363725 5365460 I WON'T REMEMBER A GODDAMN THING.
5366961 5369764 IF YOU HAVE ANYTHING TERRIBLY IMPORTANT TO SAY TO SWITCH,
5369764 5371432 I SUGGEST YOU SAY IT NOW.
5389951 5393421 AND RIGHT NOW, I'M GONNA PROVE IT TO YOU.
5396691 5398726 THEN THERE'S NO WAY I CAN PULL THIS PLUG.
5398726 5400762 I MEAN, IF NEO'S THE ONE...

5407835 5410304 I MEAN, HOW CAN HE BE THE ONE...
5412573 5415109 YOU NEVER DID ANSWER ME BEFORE...
5415109 5417111 IF YOU BOUGHT INTO MORPHEUS' BULLSHIT.
5417111 5422450 COME ON, ALL I WANT IS A LITTLE YES OR NO.
5440334 5442703 BELIEVE IT OR NOT, YOU PIECE OF SHIT,
5497358 5500228 Agent Smith: HAVE YOU EVER STOOD AND STARED AT IT...
5507168 5513674 BILLIONS OF PEOPLE JUST LIVING OUT THEIR LIVES...
5519647 5522984 DID YOU KNOW THAT THE FIRST MATRIX

5533494 5535162 NO ONE WOULD ACCEPT THE PROGRAM.
5538699 5542870 SOME BELIEVED THAT WE LACKED THE PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE
5545373 5548509 BUT I BELIEVE THAT AS A SPECIES,
5554048 5556217 SO THE PERFECT WORLD WAS A DREAM
5556217 5562056 THAT YOUR PRIMITIVE CEREBRUM KEPT TRYING TO WAKE UP FROM.
5563157 5567061 WHICH IS WHY THE MATRIX WAS REDESIGNED TO THIS...
5573267 5575803 BECAUSE AS SOON AS WE STARTED THINKING FOR YOU,
5577805 5582343 WHICH IS, OF COURSE, WHAT THIS IS ALL ABOUT.
5597925 5602229 THE FUTURE IS OUR WORLD, MORPHEUS.
5610071 5612540 Neo: WHAT ARE THEY DOING TO HIM?
5620948 5623150 AND HIS ALPHA PATTERNS WILL CHANGE
5626153 5629523 WHEN IT DOES, MORPHEUS WILL TELL THEM ANYTHING THEY WANT TO KNOW.
5631892 5634428 IS GIVEN CODES TO ZION'S MAINFRAME COMPUTER.
5634428 5636130 IF AN AGENT GOT THE CODES
5641369 5644105 TRINITY, ZION'S MORE IMPORTANT THAN ME...
5650277 5652146 WELL, THERE HAS TO BE SOMETHING THAT WE CAN DO.

5657551 5660855 YOU'RE GONNA KILL HIM? KILL MORPHEUS?
5660855 5663224 WE DON'T HAVE ANY OTHER CHOICE.
5669764 5672900 NEVER SEND A HUMAN TO DO A MACHINE'S JOB.

5674568 5678472 THEY'LL SEVER THE CONNECTION AS SOON AS POSSIBLE, UNLESS...
5680841 5682343 WE HAVE NO CHOICE BUT TO CONTINUE AS PLANNED.
5690317 5693788 MORPHEUS, YOU WERE MORE THAN A LEADER TO US.
5708803 5710671 I DON'T BELIEVE THIS IS HAPPENING.
5710671 5711972 NEO, THIS HAS TO BE DONE.

5719246 5721615 SHE TOLD ME THIS WOULD HAPPEN.
5724085 5725886 THAT I WOULD HAVE TO MAKE A CHOICE.
5737865 5739767 SO THAT WE COULD GET YOU OUT.
5739767 5741769 THERE IS NO WAY THAT YOU'RE GOING BACK IN.
5743337 5745840 BECAUSE HE BELIEVED THAT I'M SOMETHING I'M NOT.
5750377 5752580 THE ORACLE HIT ME WITH THAT, TOO.
5753881 5756784 I'M SORRY, I'M NOT. I'M JUST ANOTHER GUY.
5765392 5768129 NEO, THIS IS LOCO. THEY'VE GOT MORPHEUS
5769797 5772066 EVEN IF YOU SOMEHOW GOT INSIDE,
5776904 5779406 BUT WHAT YOU'RE TALKING ABOUT IS SUICIDE.
5779406 5781542 I KNOW THAT'S WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE,
5782810 5785146 I CAN'T EXPLAIN TO YOU WHY IT'S NOT.
5788048 5790084 AND HE WAS READY TO GIVE HIS LIFE FOR WHAT HE BELIEVED.
5792153 5793487 THAT'S WHY I HAVE TO GO.
5798292 5800361 I BELIEVE I CAN BRING HIM BACK.
5822650 5825052 LET ME TELL YOU WHAT I BELIEVE.
5825052 5826520 I BELIEVE MORPHEUS MEANS MORE TO ME
5827755 5829790 I BELIEVE IF YOU WERE REALLY SERIOUS ABOUT SAVING HIM,
5829790 5832326 YOU ARE GOING TO NEED MY HELP.
5832326 5834795 AND SINCE I AM THE RANKING OFFICER ON THIS SHIP,
5836163 5837798 I BELIEVE YOU CAN GO TO HELL...
5837798 5840935 BECAUSE YOU AREN'T GOING ANYWHERE ELSE.
5853480 5857518 I'D LIKE TO SHARE A REVELATION THAT I'VE HAD...
5859086 5863357 IT CAME TO ME WHEN I TRIED TO CLASSIFY YOUR SPECIES.
5863357 5868429 I REALIZED THAT YOU'RE NOT ACTUALLY MAMMALS.
5880107 5884245 YOU MOVE TO AN AREA AND YOU MULTIPLY...
5884245 5889216 AND MULTIPLY UNTIL EVERY NATURAL RESOURCE IS CONSUMED.
5889216 5894688 THE ONLY WAY YOU CAN SURVIVE IS TO SPREAD TO ANOTHER AREA.
5899927 5902229 THERE IS ANOTHER ORGANISM ON THIS PLANET
5905132 5907735 DO YOU KNOW WHAT IT IS?
5921882 5924184 OK, SO WHAT DO YOU NEED?
5942436 5944538 NO ONE HAS EVER DONE ANYTHING LIKE THIS.
5946307 5948275 THAT'S WHY IT'S GOING TO WORK.
5954315 5957451 PERHAPS WE'RE ASKING THE WRONG QUESTIONS.
5977204 5980307 THEY'RE COMING FOR YOU. THEY'RE COMING.
5984611 5989283 I'M GOING TO BE HONEST...WITH YOU.
6005332 6006500 WHATEVER YOU WANT TO CALL IT.
6006500 6009103 I CAN'T STAND IT ANY LONGER.
6012973 6015242 IF THERE IS SUCH A THING.
6034995 6037731 I MUST GET OUT OF HERE.
6040134 6045005 AND IN THIS MIND IS THE KEY, MY KEY.
6046206 6048142 THERE IS NO NEED FOR ME TO BE HERE.
6051879 6054415 I HAVE TO GET INSIDE ZION,
6054415 6057151 AND YOU HAVE TO TELL ME HOW.
6057151 6059386 YOU'RE GOING TO TELL ME OR...
6298759 6301662 I THINK THEY'RE TRYING TO SAVE HIM.
6351211 6354781 I REPEAT, WE ARE UNDER ATTACK!
6430490 6432626 I'VE NEVER SEEN ANYONE MOVE THAT FAST.

6725351 6728455 NEO, SOONER OR LATER, YOU'RE GOING TO REALIZE JUST AS I DID,
6728455 6731357 THERE'S A DIFFERENCE BETWEEN KNOWING THE PATH
6738264 6739899 GOD DAMN, IT'S GOOD TO HEAR YOUR VOICE, SIR.
6807667 6810470 NEO, I WANT TO TELL YOU SOMETHING.
6813506 6817844 BUT I'M AFRAID OF WHAT IT COULD MEAN IF I DO.
6820847 6824317 EVERYTHING THE ORACLE TOLD ME HAS COME TRUE.
6858751 6860687 AN AGENT. YOU HAVE TO SEND ME BACK.
6940867 6945071 I'M GONNA ENJOY WATCHING YOU DIE...
7078371 7081741 THAT IS THE SOUND OF INEVITABILITY.
7083443 7088281 IT IS THE SOUND OF YOUR DEATH.
7157116 7159118 WE CAN'T USE THAT UNTIL HE'S OUT.
7175601 7177203 GET ME THE HELL OUT OF HERE!
7177203 7178671 GOT A PATCH ON AN OLD EXIT.
7206032 7208301 UH, HELP. NEED A LITTLE HELP.
7226719 7228921 Tank: THE DOOR ON YOUR LEFT.
7303029 7306666 Tank: THE FIRE ESCAPE AT THE END OF THE ALLEY. ROOM 303.
7439532 7443502 The Oracle told me that I would fall in love
7444970 7448174 the man that I loved would be the one.

7692217 7694153 TO TELL YOU HOW THIS IS GOING TO END.

7698190 7699792 I'M GOING TO HANG UP THIS PHONE,

7703228 7707733 I'M GOING TO SHOW THEM A WORLD WITHOUT YOU,
7707733 7709735 A WORLD WITHOUT RULES AND CONTROLS,
7711670 7715274 A WORLD WHERE ANYTHING IS POSSIBLE.
