lines: 48444 51864 - Is everything in place? - You're not to relieve me.
52114 54742 I know, but I felt like taking a shift.
55284 57662 You like him, don't you? You like watching him.
57912 60915 - Don't be ridiculous. - We're going to kill him.
68965 71050 - Did you hear that? - Hear what?
71259 72885 Are you sure this line is clean?

114887 116680 - Freeze! Police!
- Hands on your head!

143165 146376 Lieutenant, you were given
specific orders.

148962 153383 You give me that "juris-my-dick-tion"
crap, you can cram it up your ass.
153842 156345 The orders were for your protection.
157846 160057 I think we can handle one little girl.

169024 172152 No, lieutenant, your men
are already dead.

205227 207312 Morpheus, the line was traced.
I don't know how.
207562 209189 I know. They cut the hard line.
209398 211566 There's no time. Get to another exit.
217657 220034 There's a phone at Wells and Lake.
322178 324181 Get up, Trinity. Just get up.
378610 380362 We have the name of their next target.

519544 522422 You're my savior.
My own personal Jesus Christ.

524799 526926 I know. This never happened.
You don't exist.
530388 532432 You look a little whiter than usual.

538731 543277 Ever have that feeling where you're
not sure if you're awake or dreaming?

544069 546822 All the time.
It's called mescaline.
547323 549450 It's the only way to fly.

550326 552828 It just sounds like you
need to unplug.

555998 559752 What do you think, Dujour?
Should we take him with us?
563213 566300 No, I can't. I have work tomorrow.
611637 612805 How do you know that name?
613639 615349 I know a lot about you.

616225 618310 - Who are you?
- My name is Trinity.
625692 627152 That was a long time ago.
637413 639623 That was you on my computer.
642000 644711 Right now, all I can tell you...

647340 649759 - I brought you here to warn you.
- Of what?
658518 660353 I know why you're here, Neo.
661146 663106 I know what you've been doing.
663356 665233 I know why you hardly sleep...

665525 668653 why you live alone and why,
night after night...

674742 677745 I know, because I was once
looking for the same thing.

680999 684085 he told me I wasn't really
looking for him...
685003 686754 I was looking for an answer.
687380 690508 It's the question that drives us, Neo.

691176 693845 It's the question
that brought you here.
702479 704939 The answer is out there, Neo.

731758 734594 You have a problem with authority,
Mr. Anderson.

734844 738890 You believe that you are special,
that the rules do not apply to you.

744562 747440 This is one of the top
software companies in the world...

747690 751069 because employees understand
they are part of a whole.

751319 755950 Thus, if an employee has a problem,
the company has a problem.

758202 761413 The time has come to make
a choice, Mr. Anderson.

762289 766168 Either you choose to be at your desk
on time from this day forth...
766794 769380 or you choose to find another job.
815843 819179 Hello, Neo. Do you know who this is?
825686 828856 I don't know if you're ready to see what I want to show you.
829106 832276 But unfortunately, you and I have run out of time.
832526 836238 They're coming for you, and I don't know what they're going to do.
861681 865018 I don't know. If you don't want to find out, get out of there.
866436 869606 I can guide you, but you must do exactly as I say.
869814 872484 - Okay. - The cubicle across from you is empty.
875612 877739 - But what if they... - Go. Now.
894089 896841 When I tell you, go to the end of the row...
897092 899052 to the office at the end of the hall.
919489 923034 Good. Now, outside there is a scaffold.
925745 928081 - How do you know this? - We don't have time.
928331 931167 To your left there's a window. Go to it.

937841 940427 No way! No way!
This is crazy!
940677 943054 There are two ways out of this building.
943304 947100 One is that scaffold. The other is in their custody.
947350 950562 You take a chance either way. I leave it to you.
957068 958945 Why is this happening to me?

961239 963992 I'm nobody.
I didn't do anything.

1067972 1072810 As you can see, we've had our eye on
you for some time now, Mr. Anderson.
1074103 1076773 It seems that you've been living...

1080569 1083071 In one life,
you're Thomas A. Anderson...

1083321 1086658 program writer for
a respectable software company.

1087701 1090996 You have a social security number.
You pay your taxes.

1094291 1097919 help your landlady
carry out her garbage.
1100422 1103550 The other life is lived in computers...

1103842 1106803 where you go by
the hacker alias "Neo"...

1107053 1111850 and are guilty of virtually every
computer crime we have a law for.
1117522 1119524 And one of them does not.

1123236 1127073 I'm going to be as forthcoming
as I can be, Mr. Anderson.

1135624 1138627 We know that you've been contacted
by a certain...

1146635 1150639 Whatever you think you know
about this man is irrelevant.
1150889 1153308 He is considered by many authorities...
1153558 1156603 to be the most dangerous man alive.

1160982 1163902 believe that I am wasting
my time with you.

1164194 1167614 But I believe you wish
to do the right thing.
1167906 1171409 We're willing to wipe the slate clean...

1174412 1177332 All we're asking in return
is your cooperation...

1177582 1181086 in bringing
a known terrorist to justice.
1185007 1187093 That sounds like a really good deal.
1188719 1190471 But I got a better one.
1197228 1199230 and you give me my phone call.

1208739 1211367 You can't scare me
with this gestapo crap.
1218374 1219792 what good is a phone call...

1257413 1259623 You're going to help us,
Mr. Anderson...
1260124 1262293 whether you want to or not.
1320727 1323980 This line is tapped, so I must be brief.
1324231 1328527 They got to you first, but they've underestimated how important you are.

1333865 1337577 What are you talking about?
What is happening to me?
1337828 1342666 You are the One, Neo. You may have spent the last few years...
1342916 1345877 looking for me, but I've spent my entire life...
1349172 1351341 Now, do you still want to meet?
1352300 1355178 - Yes. - Then go to the Adams Street bridge.

1379953 1382497 It's necessary, Neo.
For our protection.
1395260 1397262 We don't have time for 20 Questions.
1397762 1400141 Right now, there's only one rule:
1412695 1415156 Please, Neo, you have to trust me.

1415740 1418367 - Why?
- Because you have been down there.
1421329 1422955 You know exactly where it ends.

1425166 1427418 And I know that's
not where you want to be.

1445645 1447813 Lie back.
Lift up your shirt.

1478344 1480596 - You're gonna lose it.
- No, I'm not.
1530981 1533442 Let me give you one piece of advice.
1537654 1539865 He knows more than you can imagine.
1553754 1555672 As you no doubt have guessed...
1558216 1559801 It's an honor to meet you.

1583742 1586495 that right now you're feeling
a bit like Alice...
1593460 1596088 I can see it in your eyes.

1596671 1599966 You have the look of a man
who accepts what he sees...
1600217 1602469 because he's expecting to wake up.

1603887 1606473 Ironically, this is not
far from the truth.
1607182 1609559 Do you believe in fate, Neo?

1612521 1615316 I don't like the idea that
I'm not in control of my life.
1616401 1619737 I know exactly what you mean.
1624033 1626411 Let me tell you why you're here.

1629539 1631165 What you know,
you can't explain.
1633835 1635753 You felt it your entire life:

1636337 1640508 Something's wrong with the world.
You don't know what, but it's there.
1641008 1643219 Like a splinter in your mind...

1646264 1649016 It is this feeling
that has brought you to me.

1651561 1653396 Do you know what
I'm talking about?
1669662 1671622 Even now, in this very room.

1672457 1674667 You can see it when you
look out your window...
1674917 1677253 or when you turn on your television.
1677670 1680214 You can feel it when you go to work...

1687054 1689974 It is the world that has been
pulled over your eyes...
1690224 1691809 to blind you from the truth.

1702570 1704864 Like everyone else,
you were born into bondage...

1705114 1709785 born into a prison that you cannot
smell or taste or touch.
1728263 1730140 You have to see it for yourself.
1742194 1744530 After this, there is no turning back.

1746782 1749826 the story ends, you wake up
in your bed and believe...

1756166 1758877 and I show you how deep
the rabbit hole goes.

1770806 1773850 all I'm offering is the truth.
Nothing more.

1826612 1828614 The pill you took is
part of a trace program.

1829364 1833995 It disrupts your carrier signals
so we can pinpoint your location.

1836164 1838333 It means buckle your
seat belt, Dorothy...

1891594 1895682 Have you ever had a dream, Neo,
that you were so sure was real?

1897141 1899727 What if you were unable
to wake from that dream?

1899977 1902480 How would you know the difference
between the dream world...
1924627 1926295 Tank, we'll need a signal soon.

1927797 1930466 - I got a fibrillation.
- Apoc, location.

1937140 1939643 - Lock. I got him!
- Now, Tank, now!

2125538 2128333 - I hope you're right.
- I don't have to hope.
2153358 2154777 He still needs a lot of work.

2157655 2159865 Your muscles atrophied.
We're rebuilding them.
2256128 2258380 when in fact, it's closer to 2199.

2259506 2262260 I can't tell you exactly
what year it is...

2264637 2267474 There's nothing I can say
that will explain it for you.

2267724 2270477 Come with me.
See for yourself.

2290080 2293833 where we broadcast our pirate signal
and hack into the Matrix.
2297212 2300381 Most of my crew you already know.

2311935 2315647 The ones you don't know:
Tank and his big brother, Dozer.
2316523 2318942 The little one behind you is Mouse.

2323279 2326533 You wanted to know
what the Matrix is?
2356271 2358106 This will feel a little weird.
2376125 2378586 We can load anything, from clothing...

2390014 2392433 Right now we're inside
a computer program?
2392725 2394643 Is it really so hard to believe?

2395144 2397771 Your clothes are different.
The plugs in your body are gone.

2401442 2404778 Your appearance now is what we call
"residual self-image."

2405487 2408115 It is the mental projection
of your digital self.

2419835 2421754 If you're talking about
what you can feel...
2422004 2424423 what you can smell, taste and see...

2424673 2428552 then "real" is simply electrical
signals interpreted by your brain.
2432723 2435142 This is the world that you know.

2436560 2439605 The world as it was at the end
of the 20th century.

2441982 2446320 It exists now only as part of
a neural-interactive simulation...

2452368 2455162 You've been living
in a dream world, Neo.

2481189 2483566 We have only bits and pieces
of information.

2483817 2487612 But what we know for certain
is that in the early 21st century...

2487862 2491116 all of mankind was united
in celebration.

2491366 2496121 We marveled at our own magnificence
as we gave birth to AI.

2500709 2505130 A singular consciousness that spawned
an entire race of machines.

2505964 2509426 We don't know who struck first,
us or them.

2509843 2513054 But we know that it was us
that scorched the sky.
2514723 2516891 They were dependent on solar power...

2517142 2520478 and it was believed that
they would be unable to survive...

2520812 2524316 without an energy source
as abundant as the sun.

2524566 2529446 Throughout human history, we have
been dependent on machines to survive.

2530905 2535118 Fate, it seems, is not
without a sense of irony.

2538330 2542751 The human body generates more
bioelectricity than a 120-volt battery.
2543001 2547130 And over 25,000 BTUs of body heat.
2549049 2551217 Combined with a form of fusion...

2551551 2556389 the machines had found all the energy
they would ever need.

2560435 2564189 There are fields, Neo,
endless fields...

2564439 2567692 where human beings
are no longer born.

2576284 2578870 For the longest time,
I wouldn't believe it.

2579120 2581790 And then I saw the fields
with my own eyes...

2585002 2588339 so they could be fed intravenously
to the living.

2588881 2593135 And standing there,
facing the pure, horrifying precision...

2593386 2596305 I came to realize
the obviousness of the truth.

2604355 2607733 The Matrix is a computer-generated
dream world...
2608526 2611612 built to keep us under control...
2612780 2615950 in order to change a human being...

2625626 2630214 I didn't say it would be easy, Neo.
I just said it would be the truth.
2634218 2636137 Let me out! I want out!

2638097 2640766 - Easy, Neo. Easy.
- Get this thing out of me.
2641016 2642685 Get this thing out of me!
2675593 2677386 I can't go back, can I?

2690316 2693570 We never free a mind
once it's reached a certain age.
2695530 2697240 The mind has trouble letting go.
2697491 2699784 I've seen it before, and I'm sorry.
2700827 2702913 I did what I did because...

2713507 2717594 When the Matrix was first built,
there was a man born inside...

2718094 2721890 who had the ability
to change whatever he wanted...
2722265 2725185 to remake the Matrix as he saw fit.
2726937 2730398 It was he who freed the first of us...
2734361 2737447 As long as the Matrix exists...
2737781 2739866 the human race will never be free.

2749626 2752837 and that his coming would hail
the destruction of the Matrix...

2757676 2762305 That is why there are those of us who
spent our lives searching the Matrix...
2766643 2768728 I did what I did because...
2770355 2772482 I believe that search is over.
2814942 2816861 I'm Tank. I'll be your operator.

2817320 2819739 - You don't have any...
- Holes? Nope.

2820656 2825369 Me and my brother, Dozer, are 100%
pure, old-fashioned, homegrown human.

2831459 2833919 - Zion?
- If the war was over tomorrow...
2834170 2835671 Zion's where the party would be.

2837632 2840801 The last human city.
The only place we have left.

2845389 2848809 Deep underground near the Earth's core,
where it's still warm.

2850436 2852313 You live long enough,
you might see it.

2854565 2859403 Goddamn! I gotta tell you, I'm excited
to see what you're capable of...
2859654 2861405 if Morpheus is right and all.

2861906 2864659 We're not supposed to
talk about this, but...

2870456 2873167 We got a lot to do.
We gotta get to it.

2877088 2880007 We're supposed to start
with these programs first.

2881008 2884470 That's major boring shit.
Let's do something more fun.
2912457 2914793 "Hey, Mikey, I think he likes it."

2934604 2936773 Ten hours straight.
He's a machine.

2955834 2958628 similar to the programmed reality
of the Matrix.

2958879 2961214 It has the same basic rules.
Like gravity.

2961465 2964926 These rules are no different
than those of a computer system.
2965469 2966970 Some of them can be bent.

3116996 3120666 has anything to do
with my muscles in this place?

3155369 3157579 His neuro-kinetics
are way above normal.

3183438 3186233 Come on! Stop trying to hit me,
and hit me!
3199454 3201581 I know what you're trying to do.
3203250 3205419 I'm trying to free your mind, Neo.
3205752 3207838 But I can only show you the door.
3208422 3210257 You have to walk through it.

3226356 3229067 You have to let it all go, Neo.
Fear...

3258639 3261350 - No one's ever made their first jump.
- I know.

3262685 3265146 - But what if he does?
- He won't.
3271527 3274322 Free my mind. No problem. Right.

3323204 3325832 - I thought it wasn't real.
- Your mind makes it real.
3329085 3331337 If you're killed in the Matrix...
3333172 3335633 The body cannot live without the mind.

3366123 3369501 I don't remember you ever
bringing me dinner.

3372588 3375424 There is something about him,
isn't there?

3380137 3383807 if Morpheus is so sure,
why not take him to see the Oracle?

3384725 3387644 Morpheus will take him
when he's ready.
3397446 3398989 The Matrix is a system, Neo.

3402659 3404995 But when you're inside,
what do you see?

3409499 3412085 The very minds of the people
we are trying to save.

3412336 3415297 But until we do, these people are
a part of that system...
3415547 3417466 and that makes them our enemy.

3419092 3422429 most of these people are not
ready to be unplugged.
3422679 3424264 And many of them are so inert...

3424514 3426934 so hopelessly dependent
on the system...
3427184 3429895 that they will fight to protect it.

3431396 3435150 Were you listening to me or looking
at the woman in the red dress?

3449457 3453294 It's another training program
designed to teach you one thing:

3453920 3456339 If you are not one of us,
you are one of them.

3460426 3464722 They can move in and out of any
software still hardwired to their system.

3465098 3468476 That means that anyone
we haven't unplugged...

3477527 3480655 We have survived by hiding
and running from them...

3482782 3485743 They're guarding all the doors
and holding all the keys.

3485994 3488830 Sooner or later, someone will
have to fight them.
3490540 3491958 I won't lie to you, Neo.

3492417 3497255 Every single man or woman who
has fought an agent, has died.

3497505 3499882 But where they have failed,
you will succeed.

3501384 3503678 I've seen an agent punch
through a concrete wall.

3503928 3507515 Men have emptied entire clips at them
and hit nothing but air.

3507765 3512395 Yet their strength and speed are still
based in a world built on rules.

3514022 3517400 they will never be as strong
or as fast as you can be.

3529620 3532540 I'm trying to tell you
that when you're ready...

3559026 3561487 - Did Zion send the warning?
- No, another ship.

3569370 3572581 A sentinel. A killing machine
designed for one thing.

3616166 3619044 Disables any electrical system
in the blast radius.

3619211 3621505 It's the only weapon we have
against the machines.

3627302 3630431 - Where are we?
- Their old service and waste systems.

3633016 3635727 There used to be cities
that spanned hundreds of miles.

3636228 3638147 Now these sewers are
all that's left.
3683610 3685778 You scared the bejesus out of me.

3697540 3700710 - Do you always look at it encoded?
- Well, you have to.

3700960 3704047 The image translators work
for the construct program.

3704297 3707717 But there's way too much information
to decode the Matrix.

3707967 3710929 You get used to it.
I don't even see the code.
3711179 3714599 All I see is blonde, brunette, redhead.

3727529 3729614 Because right now I'm thinking
the same thing.

3729948 3733284 Actually, I've been thinking it
ever since I got here.

3735203 3738206 Why, oh, why didn't I take
the blue pill?

3755932 3759018 Degreasing engines and
killing brain cells.
3760019 3762230 So can I ask you something?
3765233 3766859 Did he tell you why he did it?
3781292 3784086 So you're here to save the world.

3785588 3787673 What do you say
to something like that?
3822875 3826295 Do we have a deal, Mr. Reagan?
3829506 3831967 I know this steak doesn't exist.

3832968 3835721 I know that when I put it
in my mouth...

3835971 3839058 the Matrix is telling my brain
that it is...
3867670 3869588 I don't want to remember nothing.
3876220 3878223 And I want to be rich.

3893321 3895740 You get my body
back in a power plant...
3898201 3899619 I'll get you what you want.
3899869 3901871 Access codes to the Zion mainframe.
3902122 3904290 No. I told you, I don't know them.
3907252 3909254 I can get you the man who does.

3921891 3925353 Here you go, buddy.
Breakfast of champions.

3926688 3929482 Close your eyes, it feels
like you're eating runny eggs.
3931943 3933528 You know what it reminds me of?

3935363 3937699 Tastee Wheat. Did you
ever eat Tastee Wheat?

3938324 3940034 No, but technically,
neither did you.

3944205 3947459 how do the machines really know
what Tastee Wheat tasted like?

3949377 3952589 Maybe what I think Tastee Wheat
tasted like, actually tasted like...

3955258 3958094 That makes you wonder.
Take chicken, for example.

3958344 3960384 Maybe they didn't know
what to make it taste like...

3960597 3962640 which is why it tastes
like everything.

3968021 3971065 combined with synthetic aminos,
vitamins and minerals.

3972817 3975695 It doesn't have everything
the body needs.

3978448 3981534 I understand you've run through
the agent training program.
3982577 3984621 You know, I wrote that program.

3986457 3988417 - What did you think of her?
- Of who?

3988793 3991837 The woman in the red dress.
I designed her.

3995174 3999136 but if you'd like to meet her,
I can arrange a more personal milieu.
3999386 4000763 The digital pimp hard at work.

4001013 4003265 Pay no attention to
these hypocrites, Neo.

4006644 4009772 is to deny the very thing
that makes us human.
4013275 4014875 bring the ship up to broadcast depth.
4017488 4018906 I'm taking Neo to see her.

4033712 4036423 the "fasten seat belt"
and "no smoking" signs are on.
4036924 4040302 Sit back and enjoy your flight.
4081385 4082553 We'll be back in an hour.
4117047 4119549 I have these memories from my life.

4125889 4128099 That the Matrix cannot tell you
who you are.

4177190 4179609 So is this the same oracle
that made...

4181277 4185615 Yes. She's very old. She's been
with us since the beginning.
4194749 4196668 She would say she knows enough.

4201799 4204969 Try not to think of it
in terms of right and wrong.
4207263 4209140 She can help you to find the path.
4217189 4219400 That I would find the One.

4232538 4234665 I told you I can only
show you the door.
4235374 4237460 You have to walk through it.

4252183 4255978 Make yourself at home, Morpheus.
Neo, come with me.
4305861 4308406 Do not try and bend the spoon.

4311743 4315747 Instead, only try
to realize the truth.

4323755 4328218 Then you'll see that it is not the spoon
that bends. It is only yourself.
4344276 4345735 The Oracle will you see now.

4365922 4368800 Not quite what you
were expecting, right?
4378894 4380729 I'd ask you to sit down...
4380979 4383356 but you're not going to anyway.

4383857 4386735 - And don't worry about the vase.
- What vase?
4393283 4395160 I said, don't worry about it.
4396328 4398288 I'll get one of my kids to fix it.

4402167 4405962 What's really going to bake
your noodle later on is...

4406296 4409257 would you still have broken it
if I hadn't said anything?
4419018 4421270 I can see why she likes you.

4428611 4431697 You know why Morpheus
brought you to see me.
4439163 4440915 Do you think you are the One?
4454804 4456764 I'll let you in on a little secret.

4459016 4462853 Being the One is just
like being in love.

4463562 4466440 No one can tell you you're in love.
You just know it...
4475533 4477618 I'd better have a look at you.

4497138 4502101 Now I'm supposed to say,
"Hmm, that's interesting, but..."

4505855 4509817 But you already know
what I'm going to tell you.

4511235 4514196 - I'm not the One.
- Sorry, kid.

4518743 4521037 but it looks like
you're waiting for something.
4527002 4529880 Your next life, maybe. Who knows?
4530464 4532716 That's the way these things go.

4559618 4561536 Are you sure you want
to hear this?
4568210 4570379 And no one, not you, not even me...

4575926 4580263 that he's going to sacrifice
his life to save yours.

4581807 4584476 You're going to
have to make a choice.

4585102 4588688 In the one hand,
you'll have Morpheus' life.

4589189 4592067 And in the other hand,
you'll have your own.
4593485 4595779 One of you is going to die.
4597864 4601159 Which one will be up to you.
4602536 4604454 I'm sorry, kiddo. I really am.

4607457 4610168 And I hate giving
good people bad news.

4615006 4617426 As soon as you
step outside that door...

4620512 4624307 You'll remember you don't believe
in any of this fate crap.
4625142 4627894 You're in control of your own life.

4636863 4640199 I promise, by the time
you're done eating it...

4736212 4737838 - What did you see?
- What happened?
4739258 4741426 A black cat went past us...

4754439 4758860 A déjà vu is usually a glitch in the
Matrix when they change something.

4771123 4772916 They cut the hard line.
It's a trap! Get out!

4819921 4822382 That's what they changed.
We're trapped.
4822633 4824509 Be calm. Give me your phone.
4824760 4826303 They'll be able to track it.
4830932 4833769 Find a structural drawing of this building. Find it fast.
4841610 4844196 - Got it! - I need the main wet-wall.

4859879 4862006 I hope the Oracle
gave you some good news.

4994640 4996558 - We can't leave him!
- We have to!

5027589 5031426 The great Morpheus.
We meet at last.
5037224 5039268 You all look the same to me.
5109422 5111257 - Operator. - I need an exit, fast.

5113343 5116262 There was an accident.
Goddamn car accident.
5118640 5120016 Somebody up there still likes me.
5122018 5123937 Just get me out of here fast.

5124187 5126856 Nearest exit, Franklin and Erie.
An old TV repair shop.
5136366 5138284 Yes. They're moving him. I don't know where.
5138493 5140787 He's alive. We need an exit.
5143790 5145875 - I sent him to Franklin and Erie. - Got it.
5198971 5201140 I don't know. It just went dead.
5242598 5245476 I thought I was in love with you.
5252357 5254735 Too bad things had to turn out this way.

5263577 5266413 tired of fighting.
I'm tired of this ship...

5266747 5271376 of being cold, of eating
the same goddamn goop every day.
5275297 5278676 I'm tired of that jackoff and all of his bullshit.
5281638 5283848 I bet you never saw this coming...
5287435 5289813 God, I wish I could be there...

5292941 5296111 I wish I could walk in
just when it happens...
5306121 5308123 If you had told us the truth...

5308373 5311251 we would've told you to shove
that red pill up your ass!

5311501 5313628 That is not true, Cypher.
He set us free.
5319175 5321678 All I do is what he tells me to do.

5323263 5326182 If I had to choose between
that and the Matrix...
5334983 5337569 can be more real than this world.
5339737 5342240 All I do is pull the plug here.
5354419 5357380 - Welcome to the real world. - But you're out, Cypher.
5357630 5360049 - You can't go back. - That's what you think.
5362051 5365680 I go back to sleep. When I wake up, I won't remember a thing.

5367182 5370143 if you have anything important
to say to Switch...

5371978 5375023 - No, please don't.
- Not like this.

5390706 5393876 And right now,
I'm going to prove it to you.

5397171 5399048 there's no way
I can pull this plug.
5403719 5406305 some kind of a miracle to stop me.
5408307 5410392 I mean, how can he be the One...

5418275 5421487 Come on. All I want
is a little yes or no.

5440798 5445552 Believe it or not, you piece of shit,
you're still going to burn!

5473414 5475708 - You're hurt.
- I'll be all right.
5497939 5500317 Have you ever stood and stared at it?
5520295 5523173 Did you know that the first Matrix...

5523423 5528094 was designed to be a perfect
human world where none suffered...

5533808 5538146 No one would accept the program.
Entire crops were lost.

5541024 5545403 we lacked the programming language
to describe your perfect world.

5548782 5552619 human beings define
their reality through misery...
5554496 5557207 So the perfect world was a dream...

5557457 5562295 that your primitive cerebrum
kept trying to wake up from.

5563630 5567300 Which is why the Matrix was
redesigned to this.

5573681 5577811 because when we started thinking
for you, it became our civilization...

5578061 5581147 which is, of course,
what this is all about.
5598206 5602128 The future is our world, Morpheus.

5611178 5614557 - What are they doing to him?
- They're breaking into his mind.

5614807 5616976 It's like hacking a computer.
All it takes is time.

5618686 5621814 Depends on the mind.
But eventually, it'll crack...

5622064 5626485 and his alpha patterns
will change from this to this.

5626735 5629697 When it does, he'll tell them
anything they want to know.

5631240 5635286 The leader of every ship is given
codes to Zion's mainframe computer.

5635536 5638456 If an agent got the codes
and got into Zion's mainframe...

5638706 5641792 they could destroy us.
We can't let that happen.
5641959 5644211 Trinity, Zion's more important than me...

5650801 5652470 There has to be
something we can do.
5652887 5654889 There is. We pull the plug.

5670196 5673115 Never send a human
to do a machine's job.

5675367 5678579 they'll sever the connection
as soon as possible, unless...

5680789 5684335 We have no choice. Continue as planned.
Deploy the sentinels.

5690925 5693594 Morpheus, you were more
than a leader to us.
5709528 5710888 I don't believe this is happening.

5711029 5713073 - Neo, this has to be done.
- Does it?

5715575 5718036 - This can't be just coincidence.
- What?
5719746 5721540 She told me this would happen.

5721957 5726127 She told me that I would
have to make a choice.

5730799 5733301 - What are you doing?
- I'm going in.

5733635 5735971 - No, you're not.
- I have to.

5736179 5739808 Neo, Morpheus sacrificed himself
so that we could get you out.

5740058 5741977 There is no way
that you're going back in.

5742561 5745814 Morpheus did what he did because
he believed I'm something I'm not.

5751069 5754030 - The Oracle hit me with that too.
- No, you have to be.

5754281 5756950 I'm sorry, I'm not.
I'm just another guy.

5766501 5769838 This is loco. They've got Morpheus
in a military-controlled building.

5770088 5774467 Even if you somehow got inside, those
are agents holding him. Three of them.

5775760 5779681 I want Morpheus back too, but
what you're talking about is suicide.
5782976 5785353 I can't explain to you why it's not.

5786438 5790150 Morpheus believed something, and
he was ready to give his life for it.

5790400 5793403 I understand that now.
That's why I have to go.

5793695 5796197 - Why?
- Because I believe in something.
5798700 5800410 I believe I can bring him back.

5817386 5819305 - What are you doing?
- Going with you.
5822767 5824894 Let me tell you what I believe.

5825394 5827772 Morpheus means more to me
than he does to you.

5828105 5832401 I believe if you are serious about
saving him, you will need my help.
5832652 5834695 And since I am the ranking officer...

5834945 5837823 if you don't like it,
I believe you can go to hell.
5838574 5840993 Because you aren't going anywhere else.

5853881 5857176 I'd like to share
a revelation that I've had...

5859387 5863391 It came to me when I tried
to classify your species...

5873442 5878364 instinctively develops an equilibrium
with the surrounding environment.

5880991 5884537 You move to an area
and you multiply...

5884787 5889291 and multiply until every
natural resource is consumed.
5889625 5891711 The only way you can survive...
5892002 5894964 is to spread to another area.

5900386 5903264 There is another organism
on this planet...
5906100 5907768 Do you know what it is?
5923159 5924578 Okay, so what do you need?

5943013 5945557 No one has ever done
anything like this.
5946767 5948685 That's why it's going to work.

5955317 5957611 Perhaps we're asking
the wrong questions.

5977714 5980425 They're coming for you.
They're coming.

6003698 6006868 this reality,
whatever you want to call it.
6007118 6009412 I can't stand it any longer.
6013416 6015293 If there is such a thing.

6025971 6029599 And every time I do, I fear that
I have somehow been infected by it.
6035314 6037608 I must get out of here.
6040486 6043364 And in this mind is the key.

6045533 6048411 Once Zion is destroyed,
there is no need for me to be here.
6052206 6054542 I have to get inside Zion...
6054876 6057378 and you have to tell me how.

6082278 6085406 Please remove any metallic items
you're carrying. Keys, loose change.
6299122 6301624 I think they're trying to save him.

6426833 6428335 - How did you do that?
- Do what?

6428752 6432673 You moved like they do.
I've never seen anyone move that fast.
6445894 6449064 I need a pilot program for a B-212 helicopter.

6528144 6530772 Morpheus, get up.
Get up, get up.
6568810 6569852 He's not going to make it.
6708826 6711037 Do you believe it now, Trinity?

6719087 6721464 - She told me...
- She told you...

6726094 6729055 Sooner or later you'll realize,
just as I did...

6729389 6731683 there's a difference
between knowing the path...
6738898 6741442 - It's good to hear your voice. - We need an exit.

6741693 6744487 Got one ready. Subway station,
State and Balboa.

6757542 6759961 - Damn it!
- The trace was completed.

6760211 6763798 - We have their position.
- Sentinels are standing by.
6808761 6811055 Neo, I want to tell you something...

6814308 6818270 but I'm afraid of
what it could mean if I do.

6821857 6825152 Everything the Oracle
told me has come true.
6941519 6944522 I'm going to enjoy watching you die...
7078782 7081785 That is the sound of inevitability.
7084371 7087708 It is the sound of your death.

7130126 7132337 - What happened?
- I don't know. I lost him.

7150480 7152732 - How long?
- Five, maybe six minutes.

7157195 7160240 - We can't use that until he's out.
- I know. Don't worry.
7164869 7167747 What the shit? That's my phone!

7172127 7174421 Got him!
He's on the run.
7174671 7177340 Mr. Wizard, get me out of here!
7177590 7179467 I got an old exit. Wabash and Lake.
7303759 7306887 The fire escape at the end of the alley, room 303.

7442858 7448281 I'd fall in love, and that
the man I loved would be the One.
7682808 7686437 I know that you're afraid. You're afraid of us.
7691567 7694153 I didn't come here to tell you how this is going to end.
7694403 7697365 I came here to tell you how it's going to begin.
7700159 7703246 And then I'll show these people what you don't want them to see.
7703496 7705373 I'm going to show them a world...
7707667 7711295 A world without rules and controls, without borders or boundaries.
7719470 7721430 is a choice I leave to you.

subtitles.author: SeriousSub
lines: 49174 52594 TRINITY: Is everything in place? CYPHER: You're not to relieve me.
52844 55472 TRINITY: I know, but I felt like taking a shift.
56014 58392 CYPHER: You like him, don't you? You like watching him.
58642 61645 TRINITY: Don't be ridiculous. CYPHER: We're going to kill him.
61895 64356 TRINITY: Morpheus believes he is the One.
65732 67568 TRINITY: It doesn't matter what I believe.
69695 71780 TRINITY: Did you hear that? CYPHER: Hear what?
71989 73615 TRINITY: Are you sure this line is clean?

115616 117409 COP 1: Freeze! Police!
COP 2: Hands on your head!

117951 119036 COP 2:
Do it! Do it now!

143894 147105 Lieutenant, you were given
specific orders.

147356 149066 LIEUTENANT:
I'm just doing my job.

149691 154112 You give me that "juris-my-dick-tion"
crap, you can cram it up your ass.
154571 157074 The orders were for your protection.
158575 160786 I think we can handle one little girl.

169753 172881 No, lieutenant, your men
are already dead.

205956 208041 Morpheus, the line was traced.
I don't know how.
208291 209918 MORPHEUS: I know. They cut the hard line.
210127 212295 There's no time. Get to another exit.
218385 220762 There's a phone at Wells and Lake.
322906 324908 Get up, Trinity. Just get up.

376001 379170 JONES: The informant is real.
SMITH: Yes.

379337 381089 BROWN:
We have the name of their next target.

520270 523148 You're my savior.
My own personal Jesus Christ.

525525 527652 I know. This never happened.
You don't exist.

528778 530864 NEO: Right.
CHOI: Something wrong, man?
531114 533158 You look a little whiter than usual.

539456 544002 Ever have that feeling where you're
not sure if you're awake or dreaming?

544794 547547 All the time.
It's called mescaline.
548048 550175 It's the only way to fly.

551051 553553 It just sounds like you
need to unplug.

556723 560477 What do you think, Dujour?
Should we take him with us?
563938 567025 No, I can't. I have work tomorrow.
612362 613530 How do you know that name?
614364 616074 I know a lot about you.

616950 619035 - Who are you?
- My name is Trinity.
626417 627877 That was a long time ago.
638138 640348 That was you on my computer.
642725 645436 Right now, all I can tell you...

648064 650483 TRINITY: I brought you here to warn you.
- Of what?
659242 661077 I know why you're here, Neo.
661870 663830 I know what you've been doing.
664080 665957 I know why you hardly sleep...

666249 669377 ...why you live alone and why,
night after night...

675466 678469 I know, because I was once
looking for the same thing.

681723 684809 ...he told me I wasn't really
looking for him...
688104 691232 It's the question that drives us, Neo.

691900 694569 It's the question
that brought you here.

to describe your perfect world.

5549461 5553298 ...human beings define
their reality through misery...
5555175 5557886 So the perfect world was a dream...

5558136 5562974 ...that your primitive cerebrum
kept trying to wake up from.

5564309 5567979 Which is why the Matrix was
redesigned to this.

5574360 5578490 ...because when we started thinking
for you, it became our civilization...

5578740 5581826 ...which is, of course,
what this is all about.
5598885 5602806 The future is our world, Morpheus.

5611856 5615235 NEO: What are they doing to him?
- They're breaking into his mind.

5615485 5617654 It's like hacking a computer.
All it takes is time.

5619364 5622492 Depends on the mind.
But eventually, it'll crack...

5622742 5627163 ...and his alpha patterns
will change from this to this.

5627413 5630375 When it does, he'll tell them
anything they want to know.

5631918 5635964 The leader of every ship is given
codes to Zion's mainframe computer.

5636214 5639134 If an agent got the codes
and got into Zion's mainframe...

5639384 5642470 ...they could destroy us.
We can't let that happen.
5642637 5644889 Trinity, Zion's more important than me...

5651479 5653148 There has to be
something we can do.
5653565 5655567 There is. We pull the plug.

5670874 5673793 Never send a human
to do a machine's job.

5676045 5679257 ...they'll sever the connection
as soon as possible, unless...

5681467 5685013 We have no choice. Continue as planned.
Deploy the sentinels.

5691603 5694272 Morpheus, you were more
than a leader to us.
5710205 5711539 I don't believe this is happening.

5711706 5713750 -Neo, this has to be done.
NEO: Does it?

5716252 5718713 - This can't be just coincidence.
- What?
5720423 5722217 She told me this would happen.

5722634 5726804 She told me that I would
have to make a choice.

5731476 5733978 - What are you doing?
- I'm going in.

5734312 5736648 TRINITY: No, you're not.
- I have to.

5736856 5740485 Neo, Morpheus sacrificed himself
so that we could get you out.

5740735 5742654 There is no way
that you're going back in.

5743238 5746491 Morpheus did what he did because
he believed I'm something I'm not.

5751746 5754707 - The Oracle hit me with that too.
- No, you have to be.

5754958 5757627 I'm sorry, I'm not.
I'm just another guy.

5767178 5770515 This is loco. They've got Morpheus
in a military-controlled building.

5770765 5775144 Even if you somehow got inside, those
are agents holding him. Three of them.

5776437 5780358 I want Morpheus back too, but
what you're talking about is suicide.
5783653 5786030 I can't explain to you why it's not.

5787115 5790827 Morpheus believed something, and
he was ready to give his life for it.

5791077 5794080 I understand that now.
That's why I have to go.

5794372 5796874 - Why?
- Because I believe in something.
5799377 5801087 I believe I can bring him back.

5818062 5819981 - What are you doing?
- Going with you.
5823443 5825570 Let me tell you what I believe.

5826070 5828448 Morpheus means more to me
than he does to you.

5828781 5833077 I believe if you are serious about
saving him, you will need my help.
5833328 5835371 And since I am the ranking officer...

5835621 5838499 ...if you don't like it,
I believe you can go to hell.
5839250 5841669 Because you aren't going anywhere else.

5854557 5857852 I'd like to share
a revelation that I've had...

5860063 5864067 It came to me when I tried
to classify your species...

5874118 5879040 ...instinctively develops an equilibrium
with the surrounding environment.

5881667 5885213 You move to an area
and you multiply...

5885463 5889967 ...and multiply until every
natural resource is consumed.
5890301 5892387 The only way you can survive...

5901062 5903940 There is another organism
on this planet...
5906776 5908444 Do you know what it is?
5923835 5925253 Okay, so what do you need?

5943688 5946232 No one has ever done
anything like this.
5947442 5949360 That's why it's going to work.

5955992 5958286 Perhaps we're asking
the wrong questions.

5978389 5981100 They're coming for you.
They're coming.

5983478 5985605 SMITH:
Can you hear me, Morpheus?

6004373 6007543 ...this reality,
whatever you want to call it.
6007793 6010087 I can't stand it any longer.
6014091 6015968 If there is such a thing.

6026646 6030274 And every time I do, I fear that
I have somehow been infected by it.
6035988 6038282 I must get out of here.
6041160 6044038 And in this mind is the key.

6046207 6049085 Once Zion is destroyed,
there is no need for me to be here.
6052880 6055216 I have to get inside Zion...
6055550 6058052 ...and you have to tell me how.

6082952 6086080 Please remove any metallic items
you're carrying. Keys, loose change.
6299794 6302296 I think they're trying to save him.

6427504 6429006 - How did you do that?
- Do what?

6429423 6433344 You moved like they do.
I've never seen anyone move that fast.
6446565 6449735 TRINITY: I need a pilot program for a B-212 helicopter.

6528814 6531442 Morpheus, get up.
Get up, get up.
6569480 6570522 He's not going to make it.
6709494 6711705 Do you believe it now, Trinity?

6719755 6722132 - She told me...
- She told you...

6726762 6729723 Sooner or later you'll realize,
just as I did...

6730057 6732351 ...there's a difference
between knowing the path...
6739566 6742110 - It's good to hear your voice. - We need an exit.

6742361 6745155 Got one ready. Subway station,
State and Nalboa.

6758210 6760629 - Damn it!
- The trace was completed.

6760879 6764466 - We have their position.
- Sentinels are standing by.
6809428 6811722 Neo, I want to tell you something...

6814975 6818937 ...but I'm afraid of
what it could mean if I do.

6822524 6825819 Everything the Oracle
told me has come true.
6942185 6945188 I'm going to enjoy watching you die...
7079447 7082450 That is the sound of inevitability.
7085036 7088373 It is the sound of your death.

7130790 7133001 TRINITY: What happened?
TANK: I don't know. I lost him.

7151144 7153396 - How long?
- Five, maybe six minutes.

7157859 7160904 -We can't use that until he's out.
MORPHEUS: I know. Don't worry.
7165533 7168411 What the shit? That's my phone!

7172791 7175085 Got him!
He's on the run.
7175335 7178004 Mr. Wizard, get me out of here!
7178254 7180131 I got an old exit. Wabash and Lake.
7304422 7307550 TANK: The fire escape at the end of the alley, room 303.

7443519 7448942 ...I'd fall in love, and that
the man I loved would be the One.
7683467 7687096 I know that you're afraid. You're afraid of us.
7692226 7694812 I didn't come here to tell you how this is going to end.
7695062 7698024 I came here to tell you how it's going to begin.
7700818 7703905 And then I'll show these people what you don't want them to see.
7704155 7706032 I'm going to show them a world...
7708326 7711954 A world without rules and controls, without borders or boundaries.
7720129 7722089 ...is a choice I leave to you.

subtitles.author: Anthoney
lines:
0 30000 <font color="#01b151" face="The Matrix I" size="44>THE</font>
<font color="#01b151" face="The Matrix I" size="77>MATRIX</font>
<font color="#019242" face="The Matrix I" size="22">abcdefg 1999 hijklmt</font>
49200 52620 Is everything in place? - You weren't supposed to relieve me.
52880 55500 I know, but I felt like taking a shift.
56040 58660 You like him, don't you? You like watching him.
58670 61670 Don't be ridiculous. - We're gonna kill him. You understand?
64680 67840 Do you? - It doesn't matter what I believe.
72060 73640 Are you sure this line is clean?

115650 117440 Freeze! Police!
- Hands on your head!
143930 147130 Lieutenant, you were given specific orders.
149720 154140 You give me that "juris-my-dick-tion" crap, you can cram it up your ass.
154600 157090 The orders were for your protection.
158610 160810 I think we can handle one little girl.
169790 172900 No, Lieutenant, your men are already dead.
205700 208310 Morpheus, the line was traced. I don't know how.
208320 209900 I know. They cut the hard line.
210160 212320 There's no time. Get to another exit.
218420 220790 There's a phone at Wells and Lake.
322940 324980 Get up, Trinity. Just get up.
379460 381360 We have the name of their next target.
520310 523420 You're my savior. My own personal Jesus Christ.
525560 527680 I know. This never happened. You don't exist.
531150 533190 You look a little whiter than usual.
539490 544040 Ever have that feeling where you're not sure if you're awake or dreaming?
544830 547580 All the time. It's called mescaline.
548080 550210 It's the only way to fly.
551090 553580 It just sounds like you need to unplug, man.
556760 560510 What do you think, Dujour? Should we take him with us?
563930 567100 No, I can't. I have work tomorrow.

612570 616070 How do you know that name?
- I know a lot about you.

616950 619020 Who are you?
- My name is Trinity.
623190 626350 The Trinity? That cracked the IRS D-base?
626360 628110 That was a long time ago.
638130 640340 That was you on my computer.
642720 645430 Right now, all I can tell you...

648060 650470 I brought you here to warn you.
- Of what?
659240 661060 I know why you're here, Neo.
661870 663820 I know what you've been doing.
664080 665950 I know why you hardly sleep...
666250 669360 why you live alone and why, night after night...
675460 678460 I know, because I was once looking for the same thing.
681720 684800 he told me I wasn't really looking for him...
685720 687470 I was looking for an answer.
688100 691220 It's the question that drives us, Neo.
691900 694570 It's the question that brought you here.
703200 705650 The answer is out there, Neo.
732480 735310 You have a problem with authority, Mr. Anderson.
735570 737559 You believe that you are special...
737560 739870 that, somehow, the rules do not apply to you.
745280 748509 This company is one of the top software companies in the world...
748510 752030 because every single employee understands that they are part of a whole.
752040 756670 Thus, if an employee has a problem, the company has a problem.
758920 762130 The time has come to make a choice, Mr. Anderson.
763010 766880 Either you choose to be at your desk on time from this day forth...
767510 770090 or you choose to find another job.
816560 819900 Hello, Neo. Do you know who this is?
826410 829570 I don't know if you're ready to see what I want to show you.
829830 832990 But unfortunately, you and I have run out of time.
833250 836950 They're coming for you, Neo, and I don't know what they're going to do.
861260 862509 What the hell do they want from me?
862510 866020 I don't know. If you don't want to find out, get out of there.
867240 870330 I can guide you, but you must do exactly as I say.
871200 873190 The cubicle across from you is empty.
894810 897800 When I tell you, go to the end of the row...
897810 900010 to the office at the end of the hall.
920210 923740 Good. Now, outside there is a scaffold.
926470 928790 How do you know this? - We don't have time.
929050 931890 To your left there's a window. Go to it.
938560 941140 No way! No way! This is crazy!
941400 943770 There are two ways out of this building.
944030 947810 One is that scaffold. The other is in their custody.
948070 951280 You take a chance either way. I leave it to you.
957790 959660 Why is this happening to me?
961960 964710 I'm nobody. I didn't do anything.
1068690 1073520 As you can see, we've had our eye on you for some time now, Mr. Anderson.
1074830 1077730 It seems that you've been living...
1081290 1083780 In one life, you're Thomas A. Anderson...
1084040 1087380 program writer for a respectable software company.
1088420 1091710 You have a social security number. You pay your taxes.
1095010 1098630 help your landlady carry out her garbage.
1101140 1104260 The other life is lived in computers...
1104560 1107520 where you go by the hacker alias "Neo"...
1107780 1112570 and are guilty of virtually every computer crime we have a law for.
1118240 1120240 And one of them does not.
1123960 1127790 I'm going to be as forthcoming as I can be, Mr. Anderson.
1136350 1139590 We know that you've been contacted by a certain...
1147360 1151350 Whatever you think you know about this man is irrelevant.
1151610 1154020 He is considered by many authorities...
1154280 1157320 to be the most dangerous man alive.
1161710 1164620 believe that I am wasting my time with you.
1164920 1168330 But I believe you wish to do the right thing.
1168630 1172130 We're willing to wipe the slate clean...
1175140 1178050 All we're asking in return is your cooperation...
1178310 1181800 in bringing a known terrorist to justice.
1185730 1187810 That sounds like a really good deal.
1189440 1191180 But I got a better one.
1197950 1199990 and you give me my phone call.
1209460 1212080 You can't scare me with this gestapo crap.
1219100 1220510 what good is a phone call...
1258140 1260340 You're going to help us, Mr. Anderson...
1261060 1263130 whether you want to or not.
1321450 1324940 This line is tapped, so I must be brief.
1324950 1329490 They got to you first, but they've underestimated how important you are.
1334590 1338290 What are you talking about? What is happening to me?
1338550 1343380 You are the One, Neo. You may have spent the last few years...
1343640 1346590 looking for me, but I've spent my entire life...
1349900 1352050 Now, do you still want to meet?
1353020 1355890 Yes. - Then go to the Adams Street bridge.

1379590 1383210 What's this?
- It's necessary, Neo. For our protection.
1395980 1397980 We don't have time for 20 Questions.
1398490 1400860 Right now, there's only one rule:
1413420 1415870 Please, Neo, you have to trust me.

1416460 1419080 Why?
- Because you have been down there.
1422050 1423710 You know exactly where it ends.
1425890 1428130 And I know that's not where you want to be.
1446370 1448530 Lie back. Lift up your shirt.

1479070 1481310 You're gonna lose it.
- No, I'm not.
1531700 1534160 Let me give you one piece of advice.
1538380 1540580 He knows more than you can imagine.
1554480 1556390 As you no doubt have guessed...
1558940 1560520 It's an honor to meet you.
1584470 1587220 that right now you're feeling a bit like Alice...
1588930 1591340 tumbling down the rabbit hole? Hm?
1594180 1596810 I can see it in your eyes.
1597400 1600680 You have the look of a man who accepts what he sees...
1600940 1603180 because he's expecting to wake up.
1604610 1607230 Ironically, this is not far from the truth.
1607910 1610400 Do you believe in fate, Neo?
1613250 1616030 I don't like the idea that I'm not in control of my life.
1617120 1620460 I know exactly what you mean.
1624760 1627130 Let me tell you why you're here.
1630260 1631890 What you know, you can't explain.
1634560 1636470 You felt it your entire life.
1637260 1638859 That there's something's wrong with the world.
1638860 1641720 You don't know what, but it's there.
1641730 1644180 Like a splinter in your mind...
1646990 1649740 It is this feeling that has brought you to me.
1652280 1654110 Do you know what I'm talking about?
1670390 1672340 Even now, in this very room.
1673180 1675630 You can see it when you look out your window...
1675640 1677970 or when you turn on your television.
1678390 1680930 You can feel it when you go to work...
1687780 1690940 It is the world that has been pulled over your eyes...
1690950 1692530 to blind you from the truth.
1700250 1702730 That you are a slave, Neo.
1703290 1706020 Like everyone else, you were born into bondage...
1706030 1710360 born into a prison that you cannot smell or taste or touch.
1728990 1730860 You have to see it for yourself.
1742920 1745240 After this, there is no turning back.
1747510 1750540 the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe...
1756890 1759590 and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes.
1771530 1774570 all I'm offering is the truth. Nothing more.
1827550 1829540 The pill you took is part of a trace program.
1830260 1832689 It's designed to disrupts your input/output carrier signal...
1832690 1834780 so we can pinpoint your location.
1836890 1839050 It means buckle your seat belt, Dorothy...
1892320 1896400 Have you ever had a dream, Neo, that you were so sure was real?
1897870 1900440 What if you were unable to wake from that dream?
1900700 1903190 How would you know the difference between the dream world...
1925350 1927010 Tank, we'll need a signal soon.

1928560 1931180 I got a fibrillation.
- Apoc, location.

1937860 1940360 Lock. I got him!
- Now, Tank, now!

2126260 2129050 I hope you're right.
- I don't have to hope.
2154080 2155490 He still needs a lot of work.
2158380 2160590 Your muscles atrophied. We're rebuilding them.
2169270 2172020 Rest, Neo. The answers are coming.

2248930 2252800 What is this place?
- More important than "what" is "when."

2253520 2256840 When?
- You believe it's the year 1999...
2256850 2259100 when in fact, it's closer to 2199.
2260230 2262980 I can't tell you exactly what year it is...
2265360 2268440 There's nothing I can say that will explain it for you.
2290810 2294550 where we broadcast our pirate signal and hack into the Matrix.
2297940 2301100 Most of my crew you already know.
2312820 2316520 The ones you don't know: Tank and his big brother, Dozer.
2317270 2319680 The little one behind you is Mouse.
2324170 2327820 You wanted to know... what the Matrix is, Neo?
2357000 2358820 This will feel a little weird.
2376850 2379550 We can load anything, from clothing...
2390740 2393150 Right now we're inside a computer program?
2393450 2395360 Is it really so hard to believe?
2395870 2398490 Your clothes are different. The plugs in your arms and head are gone.
2402170 2405500 Your appearance now is what we call "residual self-image."
2406210 2408830 It is the mental projection of your digital self.
2420740 2422800 If you're talking about what you can feel...
2422810 2425459 what you can smell, what you can taste and see...
2425460 2429480 then "real" is simply electrical signals interpreted by your brain.
2433450 2435860 This is the world that you know.
2437290 2440320 The world as it was at the end of the 20th century.
2442710 2447040 It exists now only as part of a neural-interactive simulation...
2453090 2455930 You've been living in a dream world, Neo.
2481920 2484629 We have only bits and pieces of information.
2484630 2486220 But what we know for certain...
2486230 2488520 is that at some point in the early 21st century...
2488530 2492139 all of mankind was united in celebration.
2492140 2497719 We marveled at our own magnificence as we gave birth to AI.
2501430 2505850 A singular consciousness that spawned an entire race of machines.
2506790 2510650 We don't know who struck first, us or them.
2510660 2513860 But we know that it was us that scorched the sky.
2515450 2517959 At the time, they were dependent on solar power...
2517960 2521660 and it was believed that they would be unable to survive...
2521670 2525169 without an energy source as abundant as the sun.
2525170 2530050 Throughout human history, we have been dependent on machines to survive.
2531630 2535840 Fate, it seems, is not without a sense of irony.
2539060 2543470 The human body generates more bioelectricity than a 120-volt battery.
2543730 2547860 And over 25,000 BTUs of body heat.
2549780 2551930 Combined with a form of fusion...
2552280 2557110 the machines had found all the energy they would ever need.
2561160 2564910 There are fields, Neo, endless fields...
2565170 2568420 where human beings are no longer born.
2577010 2579580 For the longest time, I wouldn't believe it.
2579850 2582520 And then I saw the fields with my own eyes...
2585730 2589060 so they could be fed intravenously to the living.
2589610 2593850 And standing there, facing the pure, horrifying precision...
2594110 2597030 I came to realize the obviousness of the truth.
2605080 2608450 The Matrix is a computer-generated dream world...
2609250 2612340 built to keep us under control...
2613510 2616670 in order to change a human being...
2626490 2628670 I didn't say it would be easy, Neo.
2629960 2631239 I just said it would be the truth.
2634950 2636850 Let me out! I want out!

2638820 2641730 Easy, Neo. Easy.
- Get this thing out of me.
2641740 2643400 Get this thing out of me!

2654420 2657920 He's gonna pop.
- Breathe, Neo. Just breathe.
2676320 2678110 I can't go back, can I?
2687410 2689340 I feel I owe you an apology.
2691150 2694660 We never free a mind once it's reached a certain age.
2694670 2697960 It's dangerous. The mind has trouble letting go.
2698220 2700510 I've seen it before, and I'm sorry.
2701550 2703630 I did what I did because...
2714230 2718310 When the Matrix was first built, there was a man born inside...
2718820 2722610 who had the ability to change whatever he wanted...
2722990 2725910 to remake the Matrix as he saw fit.
2727660 2731120 It was he who freed the first of us...
2735090 2738170 As long as the Matrix exists...
2738510 2740580 the human race will never be free.
2750350 2753560 and that his coming would hail the destruction of the Matrix...

2758400 2763030 That is why there are those of us who
spent our lives searching the Matrix...
2767370 2769450 I did what I did because...
2771080 2773210 I believe that search is over.
2815670 2817580 I'm Tank. I'll be your operator.

2818050 2820450 You don't have any...
- Holes? Nope.
2821380 2826090 Me and my brother, Dozer, are 100% pure, old-fashioned, homegrown human.

2832190 2834640 Zion?
- If the war was over tomorrow...
2834900 2836310 Zion's where the party would be.
2838360 2841530 The last human city. The only place we have left.
2847370 2849530 near the Earth's core, where it's still warm.
2851160 2853040 You live long enough, you might see it.
2857370 2860570 I gotta tell you, I'm fairly excited to see what you're capable of...
2860580 2862320 if Morpheus is right and all.
2862630 2865380 We're not supposed to talk about this, but...
2871180 2873890 We got a lot to do. We gotta get to it.
2877930 2881250 We're supposed to start with these operation programs first.
2881740 2885190 That's major boring shit. Let's do something more fun.
2898710 2900370 I'm going to learn Ju Jitsu?
2913180 2915510 "Hey, Mikey, I think he likes it."
2935330 2937540 Ten hours straight. He's a machine.
2956560 2959350 similar to the programmed reality of the Matrix.
2959610 2962299 It has the same basic rules. Rules like gravity.

2962300 2966290 What you must learn is that these rules are no
different than the rules of a computer system.
2966300 2967900 Some of them can be bent.
2973290 2975820 Then hit me, if you can.
3117720 3121390 has anything to do with my muscles in this place?
3156100 3158300 His neuro-kinetics are way above normal.
3184170 3187000 Come on! Stop trying to hit me, and hit me!
3200180 3202310 I know what you're trying to do.
3203980 3206140 I'm trying to free your mind, Neo.
3206480 3208560 But I can only show you the door.
3209150 3211020 You have to walk through it.
3227090 3229790 You have to let it all go, Neo. Fear...

3259370 3262070 No one's ever made their first jump.
- I know.

3263410 3265870 But what if he does?
- He won't.
3272260 3275040 Free my mind. No problem. Right.

3323930 3326550 I thought it wasn't real.
- Your mind makes it real.
3329810 3332220 If you're killed in the Matrix...
3333900 3336360 The body cannot live without the mind.
3366850 3370220 I don't remember you ever bringing me dinner.
3373320 3376150 There is something about him, isn't there?
3376780 3378670 Don't tell me you're a believer now?
3379410 3382610 I just keep wondering, if Morpheus is so sure...
3382870 3384940 why doesn't he take him to see the Oracle?
3385450 3388370 Morpheus will take him when he's ready.
3398300 3399850 The Matrix is a system, Neo.
3403330 3406019 But when you're inside, and look around, what do you see?
3410230 3412800 The very minds of the people we are trying to save.
3413070 3416020 But until we do, these people are a part of that system...
3416280 3419560 and that makes them our enemy. You have to understand...
3419820 3423400 most of these people are not ready to be unplugged.
3423410 3425230 And many of them are so inert...
3425240 3427650 so hopelessly dependent on the system...
3427910 3430620 that they will fight to protect it.
3432130 3435870 Were you listening to me or looking at the woman in the red dress?
3450190 3454020 It's another training program designed to teach you one thing:
3454650 3457060 If you are not one of us, you are one of them.
3461160 3465450 They can move in and out of any software still hardwired to their system.
3465830 3469190 That means that anyone we haven't unplugged...
3478260 3481620 We have survived by hiding and running from them...
3483580 3486239 They're guarding all the doors and holding all the keys.
3486240 3489970 Which means, sooner or later, someone is going to have to fight them.
3491270 3492680 I won't lie to you, Neo.
3493150 3497970 Every single man or woman who has stood their ground, everyone who has fought an Agent has died.
3498230 3500990 But where they have failed, you will succeed.
3502110 3504650 I've seen an Agent punch through a concrete wall.
3504660 3508240 Men have emptied entire clips at them and hit nothing but air.

3508500 3513279 Yet their strength and speed are still
