lines: 50342 53762 TRINITY: Is everything in place? CYPHER: You're not to relieve me.
54012 56640 TRINITY: I know, but I felt like taking a shift.
57182 59560 CYPHER: You like him, don't you? You like watching him.
59810 62813 TRINITY: Don't be ridiculous. CYPHER: We're going to kill him.
63063 65524 TRINITY: Morpheus believes he is the One.
66900 68735 TRINITY: It doesn't matter what I believe.
70862 72948 TRINITY: Did you hear that? CYPHER: Hear what?
73156 74783 TRINITY: Are you sure this line is clean?

116783 118577 COP 1: Freeze! Police!
COP 2: Hands on your head!

119119 120203 COP 2:
Do it! Do it now!

145062 148273 Lieutenant, you were given
specific orders.

148523 150233 LIEUTENANT:
I'm just doing my job.

150859 155280 You give me that "juris-my-dick-tion"
crap, you can cram it up your ass.
155739 158241 The orders were for your protection.
159743 161953 I think we can handle one little girl.

170921 174049 No, lieutenant, your men
are already dead.

207124 209209 Morpheus, the line was traced.
I don't know how.
209459 211086 MORPHEUS: I know. They cut the hard line.
211294 213463 There's no time. Get to another exit.
219553 221930 There's a phone at Wells and Lake.
324074 326076 Get up, Trinity. Just get up.

377168 380338 JONES: The informant is real.
SMITH: Yes.

380505 382257 BROWN:
We have the name of their next target.

521438 524315 You're my savior.
My own personal Jesus Christ.

526693 528820 I know. This never happened.
You don't exist.

529946 532032 NEO: Right.
CHOI: Something wrong, man?
532282 534325 You look a little whiter than usual.

540623 545170 Ever have that feeling where you're
not sure if you're awake or dreaming?

545962 548715 All the time.
It's called mescaline.
549215 551342 It's the only way to fly.

552218 554721 It just sounds like you
need to unplug.

557891 561644 What do you think, Dujour?
Should we take him with us?
565106 568193 No, I can't. I have work tomorrow.
613530 614697 How do you know that name?
615532 617242 I know a lot about you.

618118 620203 - Who are you?
- My name is Trinity.
627585 629045 That was a long time ago.
639305 641516 That was you on my computer.
643893 646604 Right now, all I can tell you...

649232 651651 TRINITY: I brought you here to warn you.
- Of what?
660410 662245 I know why you're here, Neo.
663037 664998 I know what you've been doing.
665248 667125 I know why you hardly sleep...

667417 670545 ...why you live alone and why,
night after night...

676634 679637 I know, because I was once
looking for the same thing.

682891 685977 ...he told me I wasn't really
looking for him...
689272 692400 It's the question that drives us, Neo.

693067 695737 It's the question
that brought you here.
704370 706831 The answer is out there, Neo.

733650 736486 You have a problem with authority,
Mr. Anderson.

736736 740782 You believe that you are special,
that the rules do not apply to you.

746454 749332 This is one of the top
software companies in the world...

749582 752961 ...because employees understand
they are part of a whole.

753211 757840 Thus, if an employee has a problem,
the company has a problem.

760093 763304 The time has come to make
a choice, Mr. Anderson.

764180 768059 Either you choose to be at your desk
on time from this day forth...
768685 771271 ...or you choose to find another job.
817734 821070 MORPHEUS: Hello, Neo. Do you know who this is?
827577 830747 I don't know if you're ready to see what I want to show you.
830997 834167 But unfortunately, you and I have run out of time.
834417 838129 They're coming for you, and I don't know what they're going to do.
863571 866908 I don't know. If you don't want to find out, get out of there.
868326 871496 I can guide you, but you must do exactly as I say.
871704 874374 - Okay. - The cubicle across from you is empty.
877502 879629 - But what if they... - Go. Now.
895978 898731 When I tell you, go to the end of the row...
898981 900942 ...to the office at the end of the hall.
921379 924924 Good. Now, outside there is a scaffold.
927635 929971 - How do you know this? - We don't have time.
930221 933057 To your left there's a window. Go to it.

939730 942316 No way! No way!
This is crazy!
942567 944944 There are two ways out of this building.
945194 948990 One is that scaffold. The other is in their custody.
949240 952452 You take a chance either way. I leave it to you.
958958 960835 Why is this happening to me?

963129 965882 I'm nobody.
I didn't do anything.

1069860 1074699 As you can see, we've had our eye on
you for some time now, Mr. Anderson.
1075992 1078661 It seems that you've been living...

1082456 1084959 In one life,
you're Thomas A. Anderson...

1085209 1088546 ...program writer for
a respectable software company.

1089589 1092883 You have a social security number.
You pay your taxes.

1096178 1099807 ...help your landlady
carry out her garbage.
1102310 1105438 The other life is lived in computers...

1105730 1108691 ...where you go by
the hacker alias "Neo"...

1108941 1113738 ...and are guilty of virtually every
computer crime we have a law for.
1119410 1121412 And one of them does not.

1125124 1128961 I'm going to be as forthcoming
as I can be, Mr. Anderson.

1137511 1140514 We know that you've been contacted
by a certain...

1148522 1152526 Whatever you think you know
about this man is irrelevant.
1152777 1155196 He is considered by many authorities...
1155446 1158491 ...to be the most dangerous man alive.

1162870 1165790 ...believe that I am wasting
my time with you.

1166082 1169502 But I believe you wish
to do the right thing.
1169794 1173297 We're willing to wipe the slate clean...

1176300 1179220 All we're asking in return
is your cooperation...

1179470 1182973 ...in bringing
a known terrorist to justice.
1186894 1188979 That sounds like a really good deal.
1190606 1192358 But I got a better one.
1199115 1201117 ...and you give me my phone call.

1210626 1213254 You can't scare me
with this gestapo crap.

1259300 1261510 You're going to help us,
Mr. Anderson...
1322613 1325866 MORPHEUS: This line is tapped, so I must be brief.
1326116 1330412 They got to you first, but they've underestimated how important you are.

1335751 1339463 What are you talking about?
What is happening to me?
1339713 1344552 You are the One, Neo. You may have spent the last few years...
1344802 1347763 ...looking for me, but I've spent my entire life...
1351058 1353227 Now, do you still want to meet?
1354186 1357064 - Yes. - Then go to the Adams Street bridge.

1381839 1384383 It's necessary, Neo.
For our protection.
1397146 1399148 We don't have time for 20 Questions.
1399648 1402026 Right now, there's only one rule:
1414580 1417041 Please, Neo, you have to trust me.

1417625 1420252 - Why?
- Because you have been down there.
1423213 1424840 You know exactly where it ends.

1427051 1429303 And I know that's
not where you want to be.

1447529 1449698 TRINITY: Lie back.
Lift up your shirt.

1480229 1482481 - You're gonna lose it.
- No, I'm not.
1532865 1535325 Let me give you one piece of advice.
1539538 1541749 He knows more than you can imagine.
1555637 1557556 As you no doubt have guessed...
1560100 1561685 It's an honor to meet you.

1585626 1588378 ...that right now you're feeling
a bit like Alice...
1595344 1597971 I can see it in your eyes.

1598555 1601850 You have the look of a man
who accepts what he sees...

1605771 1608357 Ironically, this is not
far from the truth.
1609066 1611443 Do you believe in fate, Neo?

1614404 1617199 I don't like the idea that
I'm not in control of my life.
1618283 1621620 I know exactly what you mean.
1625916 1628293 Let me tell you why you're here.

1631421 1633048 What you know,
you can't explain.
1635717 1637636 You felt it your entire life:

1638220 1642391 Something's wrong with the world.
You don't know what, but it's there.
1642891 1645102 Like a splinter in your mind...

1648147 1650899 It is this feeling
that has brought you to me.

1653443 1655279 Do you know what
I'm talking about?
1671545 1673505 Even now, in this very room.

1674339 1676550 You can see it when you
look out your window...
1676800 1679136 ...or when you turn on your television.
1679553 1682097 You can feel it when you go to work...

1688937 1691857 It is the world that has been
pulled over your eyes...

1704453 1706747 Like everyone else,
you were born into bondage...

1706997 1711668 ...born into a prison that you cannot
smell or taste or touch.
1730145 1732022 You have to see it for yourself.
1744076 1746411 After this, there is no turning back.

1748664 1751708 ...the story ends, you wake up
in your bed and believe...

1758048 1760759 ...and I show you how deep
the rabbit hole goes.

1772688 1775732 ...all I'm offering is the truth.
Nothing more.

1800549 1802592 MORPHEUS:
Time is always against us.

1828493 1830495 The pill you took is
part of a trace program.

1831246 1835876 It disrupts your carrier signals
so we can pinpoint your location.

1838045 1840213 It means buckle your
seat belt, Dorothy...

1893475 1897562 Have you ever had a dream, Neo,
that you were so sure was real?

1899022 1901608 What if you were unable
to wake from that dream?

1901858 1904361 How would you know the difference
between the dream world...
1926508 1928176 Tank, we'll need a signal soon.

1929678 1932347 - I got a fibrillation.
- Apoc, location.

1939020 1941523 - Lock. I got him!
- Now, Tank, now!

2127417 2130211 -I hope you're right.
MORPHEUS: I don't have to hope.
2155236 2156655 He still needs a lot of work.

2159532 2161743 Your muscles atrophied.
We're rebuilding them.

2261384 2264137 I can't tell you exactly
what year it is...

2266514 2269350 There's nothing I can say
that will explain it for you.

2269601 2272353 Come with me.
See for yourself.

2291956 2295710 ...where we broadcast our pirate signal
and hack into the Matrix.
2299088 2302258 Most of my crew you already know.

2313812 2317524 The ones you don't know:
Tank and his big brother, Dozer.
2318399 2320819 The little one behind you is Mouse.

2325156 2328409 You wanted to know
what the Matrix is?
2358147 2359983 This will feel a little weird.
2378001 2380461 We can load anything, from clothing...

2391890 2394309 NEO: Right now we're inside
a computer program?
2394601 2396519 Is it really so hard to believe?

2397020 2399647 Your clothes are different.
The plugs in your body are gone.

2403318 2406654 Your appearance now is what we call
"residual self-image."

2407363 2409991 It is the mental projection
of your digital self.

2421711 2423630 If you're talking about
what you can feel...
2423880 2426299 ...what you can smell, taste and see...

2426549 2430428 ...then "real" is simply electrical
signals interpreted by your brain.
2434599 2437018 This is the world that you know.

2438436 2441481 The world as it was at the end
of the 20th century.

2443858 2448196 It exists now only as part of
a neural-interactive simulation...

2454243 2457038 You've been living
in a dream world, Neo.

2483064 2485441 We have only bits and pieces
of information.

2485692 2489487 But what we know for certain
is that in the early 21st century...

2489737 2492991 ...all of mankind was united
in celebration.

2493241 2497996 We marveled at our own magnificence
as we gave birth to AI.

2502583 2507005 A singular consciousness that spawned
an entire race of machines.

2507839 2511300 We don't know who struck first,
us or them.

2511718 2514929 But we know that it was us
that scorched the sky.
2516597 2518766 They were dependent on solar power...

2519017 2522353 ...and it was believed that
they would be unable to survive...

2522687 2526190 ...without an energy source
as abundant as the sun.

2526441 2531320 Throughout human history, we have
been dependent on machines to survive.

2532780 2536993 Fate, it seems, is not
without a sense of irony.

2540204 2544625 The human body generates more
bioelectricity than a 120-volt battery.
2544876 2549005 And over 25,000 BTUs of body heat.
2550923 2553092 Combined with a form of fusion...

2553426 2558264 ...the machines had found all the energy
they would ever need.

2562310 2566064 There are fields, Neo,
endless fields...

2566314 2569567 ...where human beings
are no longer born.

2578159 2580745 For the longest time,
I wouldn't believe it.

2580995 2583664 And then I saw the fields
with my own eyes...

2586876 2590213 ...so they could be fed intravenously
to the living.

2590755 2595009 And standing there,
facing the pure, horrifying precision...

2595259 2598179 ...I came to realize
the obviousness of the truth.

2606229 2609607 The Matrix is a computer-generated
dream world...
2614654 2617824 ...in order to change a human being...

2627500 2632088 I didn't say it would be easy, Neo.
I just said it would be the truth.
2636092 2638010 Let me out! I want out!

2639971 2642640 - Easy, Neo. Easy.
- Get this thing out of me.
2642890 2644559 Get this thing out of me!
2677466 2679260 I can't go back, can I?

2692190 2695443 We never free a mind
once it's reached a certain age.
2697403 2699113 The mind has trouble letting go.
2699363 2701657 I've seen it before, and I'm sorry.
2702700 2704785 I did what I did because...

2715379 2719467 When the Matrix was first built,
there was a man born inside...

2719967 2723763 ...who had the ability
to change whatever he wanted...
2724138 2727058 ...to remake the Matrix as he saw fit.
2728809 2732271 It was he who freed the first of us...
2736234 2739320 As long as the Matrix exists...
2739654 2741739 ...the human race will never be free.

2751499 2754710 ...and that his coming would hail
the destruction of the Matrix...

2759548 2764178 That is why there are those of us who
spent our lives searching the Matrix...
2768516 2770601 I did what I did because...
2816814 2818733 I'm Tank. I'll be your operator.

2819191 2821610 - You don't have any...
- Holes? Nope.

2822528 2827241 Me and my brother, Dozer, are 100%
pure, old-fashioned, homegrown human.

2833331 2835791 - Zion?
- If the war was over tomorrow...

2839503 2842673 The last human city.
The only place we have left.

2847261 2850681 Deep underground near the Earth's core,
where it's still warm.

2852308 2854185 You live long enough,
you might see it.

2856437 2861275 Goddamn! I gotta tell you, I'm excited
to see what you're capable of...

2863778 2866530 We're not supposed to
talk about this, but...

2872328 2875039 We got a lot to do.
We gotta get to it.

2878959 2881879 We're supposed to start
with these programs first.

2882880 2886342 That's major boring shit.
Let's do something more fun.
2914328 2916664 "Hey, Mikey, I think he likes it."

2936475 2938644 Ten hours straight.
He's a machine.

2957705 2960499 ...similar to the programmed reality
of the Matrix.

2960749 2963085 It has the same basic rules.
Like gravity.

2963335 2966797 These rules are no different
than those of a computer system.
2967339 2968841 Some of them can be bent.

3118866 3122536 ...has anything to do
with my muscles in this place?

3157237 3159448 His neuro-kinetics
are way above normal.

3185307 3188102 Come on! Stop trying to hit me,
and hit me!
3201323 3203450 I know what you're trying to do.
3205119 3207287 I'm trying to free your mind, Neo.
3207621 3209707 But I can only show you the door.
3210290 3212126 You have to walk through it.

3228225 3230936 You have to let it all go, Neo.
Fear...

3260507 3263218 -No one's ever made their first jump.
MOUSE: I know.

3264553 3267014 - But what if he does?
- He won't.
3273395 3276190 Free my mind. No problem. Right.

3325072 3327699 - I thought it wasn't real.
- Your mind makes it real.
3330953 3333205 If you're killed in the Matrix...
3335040 3337501 The body cannot live without the mind.

3367990 3371368 I don't remember you ever
bringing me dinner.

3374454 3377291 There is something about him,
isn't there?

3382004 3385674 ...if Morpheus is so sure,
why not take him to see the Oracle?

3386592 3389511 Morpheus will take him
when he's ready.
3399313 3400856 The Matrix is a system, Neo.

3404526 3406862 But when you're inside,
what do you see?

3411366 3413952 The very minds of the people
we are trying to save.

3414202 3417164 But until we do, these people are
a part of that system...

3420959 3424296 ...most of these people are not
ready to be unplugged.
3424546 3426131 And many of them are so inert...
3429051 3431762 ...that they will fight to protect it.

3433263 3437017 Were you listening to me or looking
at the woman in the red dress?

3447903 3449529 NEO: This isn't the Matrix?
MORPHEUS: No.

3451323 3455160 It's another training program
designed to teach you one thing:

3455786 3458205 If you are not one of us,
you are one of them.

3462292 3466588 They can move in and out of any
software still hardwired to their system.

3466964 3470342 That means that anyone
we haven't unplugged...

3479393 3482521 We have survived by hiding
and running from them...

3484648 3487609 They're guarding all the doors
and holding all the keys.

3487859 3490696 Sooner or later, someone will
have to fight them.

3492406 3493824 MORPHEUS:
I won't lie to you, Neo.

3494282 3499121 Every single man or woman who
has fought an agent, has died.

3499371 3501748 But where they have failed,
you will succeed.

3503250 3505544 MORPHEUS: I've seen an agent punch
through a concrete wall.

3505794 3509381 Men have emptied entire clips at them
and hit nothing but air.

3509631 3514261 Yet their strength and speed are still
based in a world built on rules.

3515887 3519266 ...they will never be as strong
or as fast as you can be.

3531486 3534406 I'm trying to tell you
that when you're ready...

3560891 3563351 - Did Zion send the warning?
- No, another ship.

3571234 3574446 A sentinel. A killing machine
designed for one thing.

3618031 3620909 Disables any electrical system
in the blast radius.

3621076 3623370 It's the only weapon we have
against the machines.

3629167 3632295 NEO: Where are we?
- Their old service and waste systems.

3634881 3637592 TRINITY: There used to be cities
that spanned hundreds of miles.

3638093 3640011 Now these sewers are
all that's left.
3685473 3687642 You scared the bejesus out of me.

3699404 3702574 - Do you always look at it encoded?
- Well, you have to.

3702824 3705911 The image translators work
for the construct program.

3706161 3709581 But there's way too much information
to decode the Matrix.

3709831 3712792 You get used to it.
I don't even see the code.
3713043 3716463 All I see is blonde, brunette, redhead.

3729392 3731478 Because right now I'm thinking
the same thing.

3731811 3735148 Actually, I've been thinking it
ever since I got here.

3737067 3740070 Why, oh, why didn't I take
the blue pill?

3757796 3760882 Degreasing engines and
killing brain cells.
3761883 3764094 So can I ask you something?
3767097 3768723 Did he tell you why he did it?
3783154 3785949 So you're here to save the world.

3787450 3789536 What do you say
to something like that?

3824738 3828158 SMITH:
Do we have a deal, Mr. Reagan?

3834831 3837584 I know that when I put it
in my mouth...

3837834 3840920 ...the Matrix is telling my brain
that it is...
3869532 3871451 I don't want to remember nothing.
3878083 3880085 And I want to be rich.

3895183 3897602 You get my body
back in a power plant...
3901731 3903733 Access codes to the Zion mainframe.
3903983 3906152 No. I told you, I don't know them.
3909114 3911116 I can get you the man who does.

3923753 3927215 Here you go, buddy.
Breakfast of champions.

3928550 3931344 Close your eyes, it feels
like you're eating runny eggs.

3933805 3935390 MOUSE:
You know what it reminds me of?

3937225 3939561 Tastee Wheat. Did you
ever eat Tastee Wheat?

3940186 3941896 No, but technically,
neither did you.

3946067 3949320 ...how do the machines really know
what Tastee Wheat tasted like?

3951239 3954451 Maybe what I think Tastee Wheat
tasted like, actually tasted like...

3957120 3959956 That makes you wonder.
Take chicken, for example.

3960206 3962208 Maybe they didn't know
what to make it taste like...

3962459 3964502 ...which is why it tastes
like everything.

3969883 3972927 ...combined with synthetic aminos,
vitamins and minerals.

3974679 3977557 It doesn't have everything
the body needs.

3980310 3983396 I understand you've run through
the agent training program.
3984439 3986483 You know, I wrote that program.

3988318 3990278 MOUSE: What did you think of her?
NEO: Of who?

3990653 3993698 The woman in the red dress.
I designed her.

3997035 4000997 ...but if you'd like to meet her,
I can arrange a more personal milieu.
4001247 4002624 The digital pimp hard at work.

4002874 4005126 Pay no attention to
these hypocrites, Neo.

4008505 4011633 ...is to deny the very thing
that makes us human.
4015136 4016721 ...bring the ship up to broadcast depth.
4019349 4020767 I'm taking Neo to see her.

4035573 4038284 ...the "fasten seat belt"
and "no smoking" signs are on.
4038785 4042163 Sit back and enjoy your flight.
4083246 4084414 We'll be back in an hour.
4118906 4121409 I have these memories from my life.

4127749 4129959 That the Matrix cannot tell you
who you are.

4179050 4181469 So is this the same oracle
that made...

4183137 4187475 Yes. She's very old. She's been
with us since the beginning.

4187934 4189936 NEO: The beginning?
- Of the Resistance.
4196609 4198528 She would say she knows enough.

4203658 4206828 MORPHEUS: Try not to think of it
in terms of right and wrong.
4209122 4210998 She can help you to find the path.
4219048 4221259 That I would find the One.

4234397 4236524 I told you I can only
show you the door.
4237233 4239318 You have to walk through it.

4254041 4257837 Make yourself at home, Morpheus.
Neo, come with me.

4307720 4310264 BOY:
Do not try and bend the spoon.

4313601 4317605 Instead, only try
to realize the truth.

4325613 4330076 Then you'll see that it is not the spoon
that bends. It is only yourself.
4346133 4347593 The Oracle will you see now.

4367780 4370658 Not quite what you
were expecting, right?

4380751 4382587 ORACLE:
I'd ask you to sit down...

4385715 4388593 - And don't worry about the vase.
- What vase?
4395141 4397018 I said, don't worry about it.
4398185 4400146 I'll get one of my kids to fix it.

4404025 4407820 What's really going to bake
your noodle later on is...

4408154 4411115 ...would you still have broken it
if I hadn't said anything?
4420875 4423127 I can see why she likes you.

4430468 4433554 You know why Morpheus
brought you to see me.
4441020 4442772 Do you think you are the One?
4456661 4458621 I'll let you in on a little secret.

4460873 4464710 Being the One is just
like being in love.

4465419 4468297 No one can tell you you're in love.
You just know it...
4477390 4479475 ...I'd better have a look at you.

4498995 4503958 Now I'm supposed to say,
"Hmm, that's interesting, but..."

4507712 4511674 But you already know
what I'm going to tell you.

4513092 4516053 - I'm not the One.
- Sorry, kid.

4520599 4522893 ...but it looks like
you're waiting for something.
4528858 4531736 Your next life, maybe. Who knows?
4532319 4534572 That's the way these things go.

4561474 4563392 Are you sure you want
to hear this?
4570066 4572234 And no one, not you, not even me...

4577782 4582119 ...that he's going to sacrifice
his life to save yours.

4583662 4586332 ORACLE: You're going to
have to make a choice.

4586957 4590544 In the one hand,
you'll have Morpheus' life.

4591045 4593923 And in the other hand,
you'll have your own.
4595341 4597635 One of you is going to die.
4599720 4603015 Which one will be up to you.
4604391 4606310 I'm sorry, kiddo. I really am.

4609313 4612024 And I hate giving
good people bad news.

4616862 4619281 As soon as you
step outside that door...

4622368 4626163 You'll remember you don't believe
in any of this fate crap.
4626997 4629750 You're in control of your own life.

4638717 4642054 I promise, by the time
you're done eating it...

4738067 4739693 TRINITY: What did you see?
CYPHER: What happened?
4741111 4743280 A black cat went past us...

4756293 4760714 A déjà vu is usually a glitch in the
Matrix when they change something.

4772977 4774770 They cut the hard line.
It's a trap! Get out!

4821775 4824236 CYPHER: That's what they changed.
We're trapped.

4824486 4826363 MORPHEUS:
Be calm. Give me your phone.

4826613 4828157 TRINITY:
They'll be able to track it.
4832786 4835622 MORPHEUS: Find a structural drawing of this building. Find it fast.
4843464 4846050 -Got it! MORPHEUS: I need the main wet-wall.

4861732 4863859 I hope the Oracle
gave you some good news.

4982102 4983353 MORPHEUS:
You must get Neo out!

4996492 4998410 - We can't leave him!
- We have to!

5029441 5033278 The great Morpheus.
We meet at last.
5039076 5041119 You all look the same to me.

5115193 5118113 There was an accident.
Goddamn car accident.
5120490 5121867 Somebody up there still likes me.
5123869 5125787 CYPHER: Just get me out of here fast.

5126038 5128707 Nearest exit, Franklin and Erie.
An old TV repair shop.
5138216 5140135 Yes. They're moving him. I don't know where.
5140344 5142638 He's alive. We need an exit.
5145641 5147726 - I sent him to Franklin and Erie. - Got it.
5200821 5202989 I don't know. It just went dead.
5244448 5247325 ...I thought I was in love with you.
5254207 5256585 Too bad things had to turn out this way.

5265427 5268263 ...tired of fighting.
I'm tired of this ship...

5268597 5273226 ...of being cold, of eating
the same goddamn goop every day.
5277147 5280525 ...I'm tired of that jackoff and all of his bullshit.
5283487 5285697 I bet you never saw this coming...
5289284 5291661 God, I wish I could be there...

5294790 5297959 I wish I could walk in
just when it happens...
5307969 5309971 If you had told us the truth...

5310222 5313099 ...we would've told you to shove
that red pill up your ass!

5313350 5315477 That is not true, Cypher.
He set us free.
5321024 5323527 All I do is what he tells me to do.

5325111 5328031 If I had to choose between
that and the Matrix...
5336832 5339417 ...can be more real than this world.
5341586 5344089 All I do is pull the plug here.
5356268 5359229 - Welcome to the real world. - But you're out, Cypher.
5359479 5361898 - You can't go back. - That's what you think.
5363900 5367529 I go back to sleep. When I wake up, I won't remember a thing.

5369030 5371992 ...if you have anything important
to say to Switch...

5373827 5376872 - No, please don't.
- Not like this.

5392554 5395724 And right now,
I'm going to prove it to you.

5399019 5400896 ...there's no way
I can pull this plug.
5405567 5408153 ...some kind of a miracle to stop me.
5410155 5412240 I mean, how can he be the One...

5420123 5423335 Come on. All I want
is a little yes or no.

5442646 5447400 Believe it or not, you piece of shit,
you're still going to burn!

5475261 5477555 - You're hurt.
- I'll be all right.

5499786 5502163 SMITH:
Have you ever stood and stared at it?
5522142 5525020 Did you know that the first Matrix...

5525270 5529941 ...was designed to be a perfect
human world where none suffered...

5535655 5539993 No one would accept the program.
Entire crops were lost.

5542871 5547250 ...we lacked the programming language
to describe your perfect world.

5550628 5554466 ...human beings define
their reality through misery...
5556342 5559054 So the perfect world was a dream...

5559304 5564142 ...that your primitive cerebrum
kept trying to wake up from.

5565477 5569147 Which is why the Matrix was
redesigned to this.

5575528 5579657 ...because when we started thinking
for you, it became our civilization...

5579908 5582994 ...which is, of course,
what this is all about.
5600053 5603973 The future is our world, Morpheus.

5613024 5616402 NEO: What are they doing to him?
- They're breaking into his mind.

5616653 5618822 It's like hacking a computer.
All it takes is time.

5620532 5623660 Depends on the mind.
But eventually, it'll crack...

5623910 5628331 ...and his alpha patterns
will change from this to this.

5628581 5631543 When it does, he'll tell them
anything they want to know.

5633086 5637132 The leader of every ship is given
codes to Zion's mainframe computer.

5637382 5640301 If an agent got the codes
and got into Zion's mainframe...

5640552 5643638 ...they could destroy us.
We can't let that happen.
5643805 5646057 Trinity, Zion's more important than me...

5652647 5654315 There has to be
something we can do.
5654732 5656734 There is. We pull the plug.

5672041 5674961 Never send a human
to do a machine's job.

5677213 5680425 ...they'll sever the connection
as soon as possible, unless...

5682635 5686181 We have no choice. Continue as planned.
Deploy the sentinels.

5692770 5695440 Morpheus, you were more
than a leader to us.
5711372 5712707 I don't believe this is happening.

5712874 5714918 -Neo, this has to be done.
NEO: Does it?

5717420 5719881 - This can't be just coincidence.
- What?
5721591 5723384 She told me this would happen.

5723801 5727972 She told me that I would
have to make a choice.

5732644 5735146 - What are you doing?
- I'm going in.

5735480 5737815 TRINITY: No, you're not.
- I have to.

5738024 5741653 Neo, Morpheus sacrificed himself
so that we could get you out.

5741903 5743821 There is no way
that you're going back in.

5744405 5747659 Morpheus did what he did because
he believed I'm something I'm not.

5752914 5755875 - The Oracle hit me with that too.
- No, you have to be.

5756125 5758795 I'm sorry, I'm not.
I'm just another guy.

5768346 5771683 This is loco. They've got Morpheus
in a military-controlled building.

5771933 5776312 Even if you somehow got inside, those
are agents holding him. Three of them.

5777605 5781526 I want Morpheus back too, but
what you're talking about is suicide.
5784821 5787198 I can't explain to you why it's not.

5788283 5791995 Morpheus believed something, and
he was ready to give his life for it.

5792245 5795248 I understand that now.
That's why I have to go.

5795540 5798042 - Why?
- Because I believe in something.
5800545 5802255 I believe I can bring him back.

5819230 5821149 - What are you doing?
- Going with you.
5824610 5826738 Let me tell you what I believe.

5827238 5829615 Morpheus means more to me
than he does to you.

5829949 5834245 I believe if you are serious about
saving him, you will need my help.
5834495 5836539 And since I am the ranking officer...

5836789 5839667 ...if you don't like it,
I believe you can go to hell.
5840418 5842837 Because you aren't going anywhere else.

5855725 5859020 I'd like to share
a revelation that I've had...

5861230 5865234 It came to me when I tried
to classify your species...

5875286 5880208 ...instinctively develops an equilibrium
with the surrounding environment.

5882835 5886381 You move to an area
and you multiply...

5886631 5891135 ...and multiply until every
natural resource is consumed.
5891469 5893554 The only way you can survive...

5902230 5905108 There is another organism
on this planet...
5907944 5909612 Do you know what it is?
5925002 5926421 Okay, so what do you need?

5944856 5947400 No one has ever done
anything like this.
5948609 5950528 That's why it's going to work.

5957160 5959454 Perhaps we're asking
the wrong questions.

5979557 5982268 They're coming for you.
They're coming.

5984645 5986772 SMITH:
Can you hear me, Morpheus?

6005541 6008711 ...this reality,
whatever you want to call it.
6008961 6011255 I can't stand it any longer.
6015259 6017136 If there is such a thing.

6027813 6031442 And every time I do, I fear that
I have somehow been infected by it.
6037156 6039450 I must get out of here.
6042328 6045206 And in this mind is the key.

6047375 6050253 Once Zion is destroyed,
there is no need for me to be here.
6054048 6056384 I have to get inside Zion...
6056717 6059220 ...and you have to tell me how.

6084120 6087248 Please remove any metallic items
you're carrying. Keys, loose change.
6300961 6303464 I think they're trying to save him.

6428672 6430174 - How did you do that?
- Do what?

6430591 6434511 You moved like they do.
I've never seen anyone move that fast.
6447733 6450903 TRINITY: I need a pilot program for a B-212 helicopter.

6529982 6532609 Morpheus, get up.
Get up, get up.
6570647 6571690 He's not going to make it.
6710662 6712873 Do you believe it now, Trinity?

6720923 6723300 - She told me...
- She told you...

6727930 6730891 Sooner or later you'll realize,
just as I did...

6731225 6733518 ...there's a difference
between knowing the path...
6740734 6743278 - It's good to hear your voice. - We need an exit.

6743528 6746323 Got one ready. Subway station,
State and Balboa.

6759378 6761797 - Damn it!
- The trace was completed.

6762047 6765634 - We have their position.
- Sentinels are standing by.
6810595 6812889 Neo, I want to tell you something...

6816143 6820105 ...but I'm afraid of
what it could mean if I do.

6823692 6826987 Everything the Oracle
told me has come true.
6943353 6946356 I'm going to enjoy watching you die...
7080615 7083618 That is the sound of inevitability.
7086204 7089541 It is the sound of your death.

7131958 7134169 TRINITY: What happened?
TANK: I don't know. I lost him.

7152312 7154564 - How long?
- Five, maybe six minutes.

7159027 7162072 -We can't use that until he's out.
MORPHEUS: I know. Don't worry.
7166701 7169579 What the shit? That's my phone!

7173958 7176252 Got him!
He's on the run.
7176503 7179172 Mr. Wizard, get me out of here!
7179422 7181299 I got an old exit. Wabash and Lake.
7305590 7308718 TANK: The fire escape at the end of the alley, room 303.

7444687 7450109 ...I'd fall in love, and that
the man I loved would be the One.
7684635 7688264 I know that you're afraid. You're afraid of us.
7693394 7695980 I didn't come here to tell you how this is going to end.
7696230 7699192 I came here to tell you how it's going to begin.
7701986 7705072 And then I'll show these people what you don't want them to see.
7705323 7707200 I'm going to show them a world...
7709493 7713122 A world without rules and controls, without borders or boundaries.
7721297 7723257 ...is a choice I leave to you.

subtitles.author: tedi
lines: 50343 53762 TRINITY: Is everything in place? CYPHER: You're not to relieve me.
54013 56640 TRINITY: I know, but I felt like taking a shift.
57183 59559 CYPHER: You like him, don't you? You like watching him.
59810 62812 TRINITY: Don't be ridiculous. CYPHER: We're going to kill him.
63064 65523 TRINITY: Morpheus believes he is the One.
66901 68735 TRINITY: It doesn't matter what I believe.
70863 72948 TRINITY: Did you hear that? CYPHER: Hear what?
73157 74783 TRINITY: Are you sure this line is clean?

116784 118576 COP #1: Freeze! Police!
COP #2: Hands on your head!

119120 120203 COP #2:
Do it! Do it now!

145062 148273 Lieutenant, you were given
specific orders.

148524 150233 LIEUTENANT:
I'm just doing my job.

150860 155280 You give me that "juris-my-dick-tion"
crap, you can cram it up your ass.
155740 158241 The orders were for your protection.
159744 161953 I think we can handle one little girl.

170921 174049 No, lieutenant, your men
are already dead.

207124 209209 Morpheus, the line was traced.
I don't know how.
209460 211086 MORPHEUS: I know. They cut the hard line.
211295 213463 There's no time. Get to another exit.
213714 216132 - Are there any agents? - MORPHEUS: Yes.
219553 221930 There's a phone at Wells and Lake.
324074 326075 Get up, Trinity. Just get up.

377169 380338 JONES: The informant is real.
SMITH: Yes.

380506 382257 BROWN:
We have the name of their next target.

521438 524315 You're my savior.
My own personal Jesus Christ.

526694 528820 I know. This never happened.
You don't exist.

529947 532031 NEO: Right.
CHOI: Something wrong, man?
532282 534325 You look a little whiter than usual.

540624 545169 Ever have that feeling where you're
not sure if you're awake or dreaming?

545963 548715 All the time.
It's called mescaline.
549216 551342 It's the only way to fly.

552219 554721 It just sounds like you
need to unplug.

557891 561644 What do you think, Dujour?
Should we take him with us?
565107 568192 No, I can't. I have work tomorrow.
613530 614697 How do you know that name?
615532 617241 I know a lot about you.

618118 620203 - Who are you?
- My name is Trinity.
627586 629045 That was a long time ago.
639306 641516 That was you on my computer.
643894 646604 Right now, all I can tell you...

649233 651651 - TRINITY: I brought you here to warn you.
- Of what?
660410 662245 I know why you're here, Neo.
663038 664997 I know what you've been doing.
665249 667124 I know why you hardly sleep...

667417 670545 ...why you live alone and why,
night after night...

676635 679637 I know, because I was once
looking for the same thing.

682891 685977 ...he told me I wasn't really
looking for him...
689273 692400 It's the question that drives us, Neo.

693068 695736 It's the question
that brought you here.
704371 706831 The answer is out there, Neo.

733650 736485 You have a problem with authority,
Mr. Anderson.

736737 740781 You believe that you are special,
that the rules do not apply to you.

746455 749332 This is one of the top
software companies in the world...

749583 752960 ...because employees understand
they are part of a whole.

753211 757840 Thus, if an employee has a problem,
the company has a problem.

760093 763304 The time has come to make
a choice, Mr. Anderson.

764181 768059 Either you choose to be at your desk
on time from this day forth...
768685 771270 ...or you choose to find another job.
817734 821070 MORPHEUS: Hello, Neo. Do you know who this is?
827577 830746 I don't know if you're ready to see what I want to show you.
830998 834166 But unfortunately, you and I have run out of time.
834418 838129 They're coming for you, and I don't know what they're going to do.
863572 866907 I don't know. If you don't want to find out, get out of there.
868326 871495 I can guide you, but you must do exactly as I say.
871705 874373 - Okay. - The cubicle across from you is empty.
877502 879628 - But what if they... - Go. Now.
895979 898731 When I tell you, go to the end of the row...
898982 900941 ...to the office at the end of the hall.
921379 924924 Good. Now, outside there is a scaffold.
927636 929970 - How do you know this? - We don't have time.
930222 933057 To your left there's a window. Go to it.

939731 942316 No way! No way!
This is crazy!
942567 944944 There are two ways out of this building.
945195 948989 One is that scaffold. The other is in their custody.
949241 952451 You take a chance either way. I leave it to you.
958959 960835 Why is this happening to me?

963130 965881 I'm nobody.
I didn't do anything.

1069861 1074698 As you can see, we've had our eye on
you for some time now, Mr. Anderson.
1075992 1078661 It seems that you've been living...

1082457 1084959 In one life,
you're Thomas A. Anderson...

1085210 1088545 ...program writer for
a respectable software company.

1089589 1092883 You have a social security number.
You pay your taxes.

1096179 1099807 ...help your landlady
carry out her garbage.
1102310 1105437 The other life is lived in computers...

1105730 1108691 ...where you go by
the hacker alias "Neo"...

1108942 1113737 ...and are guilty of virtually every
computer crime we have a law for.
1119411 1121412 And one of them does not.

1125125 1128961 I'm going to be as forthcoming
as I can be, Mr. Anderson.

1137512 1140514 We know that you've been contacted
by a certain...

1148523 1152526 Whatever you think you know
about this man is irrelevant.
1152777 1155195 He is considered by many authorities...
1155447 1158490 ...to be the most dangerous man alive.

1162871 1165789 ...believe that I am wasting
my time with you.

1166082 1169501 But I believe you wish
to do the right thing.
1169794 1173297 We're willing to wipe the slate clean...

1176301 1179219 All we're asking in return
is your cooperation...

1179471 1182973 ...in bringing
a known terrorist to justice.
1186895 1188979 That sounds like a really good deal.
1190607 1192358 But I got a better one.
1199115 1201116 ...and you give me my phone call.

1210627 1213253 You can't scare me
with this gestapo crap.

1259300 1261510 You're going to help us,
Mr. Anderson...
1322614 1325866 MORPHEUS: This line is tapped, so I must be brief.
1326117 1330412 They got to you first, but they've underestimated how important you are.

1335752 1339463 What are you talking about?
What is happening to me?
1339714 1344551 You are the One, Neo. You may have spent the last few years...
1344802 1347763 ...looking for me, but I've spent my entire life...
1351059 1353227 Now, do you still want to meet?
1354187 1357064 - Yes. - Then go to the Adams Street bridge.

1381839 1384383 It's necessary, Neo.
For our protection.
1397146 1399147 We don't have time for 20 Questions.
1399649 1402025 Right now, there's only one rule:
1414581 1417040 Please, Neo, you have to trust me.

1417625 1420252 - Why?
- Because you have been down there.
1423214 1424840 You know exactly where it ends.

1427051 1429303 And I know that's
not where you want to be.

1447530 1449698 TRINITY: Lie back.
Lift up your shirt.

1480229 1482481 - You're gonna lose it.
- No, I'm not.
1532865 1535325 Let me give you one piece of advice.
1539539 1541748 He knows more than you can imagine.
1555638 1557556 As you no doubt have guessed...
1560101 1561685 It's an honor to meet you.

1585626 1588378 ...that right now you're feeling
a bit like Alice...
1595344 1597971 I can see it in your eyes.

1598556 1601850 You have the look of a man
who accepts what he sees...

1605772 1608356 Ironically, this is not
far from the truth.
1609066 1611443 Do you believe in fate, Neo?

1614405 1617199 I don't like the idea that
I'm not in control of my life.
1618284 1621620 I know exactly what you mean.
1625917 1628293 Let me tell you why you're here.

1631422 1633048 What you know,
you can't explain.
1635718 1637636 You felt it your entire life:

1638221 1642390 Something's wrong with the world.
You don't know what, but it's there.
1642892 1645101 Like a splinter in your mind...

1648147 1650899 It is this feeling
that has brought you to me.

1653444 1655278 Do you know what
I'm talking about?
1671546 1673505 Even now, in this very room.

1674340 1676550 You can see it when you
look out your window...
1676801 1679135 ...or when you turn on your television.
1679554 1682097 You can feel it when you go to work...

1688938 1691857 It is the world that has been
pulled over your eyes...

1704453 1706746 Like everyone else,
you were born into bondage...

1706998 1711668 ...born into a prison that you cannot
smell or taste or touch.
1730146 1732022 You have to see it for yourself.
1744076 1746411 After this, there is no turning back.

1748664 1751708 ...the story ends, you wake up
in your bed and believe...

1758049 1760759 ...and I show you how deep
the rabbit hole goes.

1772688 1775732 ...all I'm offering is the truth.
Nothing more.

1800550 1802593 MORPHEUS:
Time is always against us.

1822656 1824365 - You did all this?
- TRINITY: Mm-hm.

1828495 1830496 The pill you took is
part of a trace program.

1831248 1835876 It disrupts your carrier signals
so we can pinpoint your location.

1838046 1840214 It means buckle your
seat belt, Dorothy...

1893477 1897563 Have you ever had a dream, Neo,
that you were so sure was real?

1899024 1901609 What if you were unable
to wake from that dream?

1901860 1904361 How would you know the difference
between the dream world...
1926510 1928177 Tank, we'll need a signal soon.

1929679 1932348 - I got a fibrillation.
- Apoc, location.

1939022 1941524 - Lock. I got him!
- Now, Tank, now!

2127419 2130212 - I hope you're right.
- MORPHEUS: I don't have to hope.
2155238 2156655 He still needs a lot of work.

2159534 2161744 Your muscles atrophied.
We're rebuilding them.

2261386 2264138 I can't tell you exactly
what year it is...

2266516 2269351 There's nothing I can say
that will explain it for you.

2269602 2272354 Come with me.
See for yourself.

2291958 2295711 ...where we broadcast our pirate signal
and hack into the Matrix.
2299090 2302259 Most of my crew you already know.

2313813 2317524 The ones you don't know:
Tank and his big brother, Dozer.
2318401 2320819 The little one behind you is Mouse.

2325158 2328410 You wanted to know
what the Matrix is?
2358149 2359983 This will feel a little weird.
2378002 2380462 We can load anything, from clothing...

2391891 2394309 NEO: Right now we're inside
a computer program?
2394602 2396520 Is it really so hard to believe?

2397021 2399648 Your clothes are different.
The plugs in your body are gone.

2403319 2406655 Your appearance now is what we call
"residual self-image."

2407365 2409992 It is the mental projection
of your digital self.

2421713 2423630 If you're talking about
what you can feel...
2423881 2426300 ...what you can smell, taste and see...

2426551 2430429 ...then "real" is simply electrical
signals interpreted by your brain.
2434601 2437019 This is the world that you know.

2438438 2441481 The world as it was at the end
of the 20th century.

2443860 2448196 It exists now only as part of
a neural-interactive simulation...

2454245 2457039 You've been living
in a dream world, Neo.

2483066 2485442 We have only bits and pieces
of information.

2485693 2489488 But what we know for certain
is that in the early 21st century...

2489739 2492991 ...all of mankind was united
in celebration.

2493242 2497996 We marveled at our own magnificence
as we gave birth to AI.

2502585 2507005 A singular consciousness that spawned
an entire race of machines.

2507840 2511301 We don't know who struck first,
us or them.

2511719 2514930 But we know that it was us
that scorched the sky.
2516599 2518767 They were dependent on solar power...

2519018 2522354 ...and it was believed that
they would be unable to survive...

2522689 2526191 ...without an energy source
as abundant as the sun.

2526442 2531321 Throughout human history, we have
been dependent on machines to survive.

2532782 2536993 Fate, it seems, is not
without a sense of irony.

2540206 2544626 The human body generates more
bioelectricity than a 120-volt battery.
2544877 2549005 And over 25,000 BTUs of body heat.
2550925 2553093 Combined with a form of fusion...

2553428 2558265 ...the machines had found all the energy
they would ever need.

2562311 2566064 There are fields, Neo,
endless fields...

2566315 2569568 ...where human beings
are no longer born.

2578161 2580746 For the longest time,
I wouldn't believe it.

2580997 2583665 And then I saw the fields
with my own eyes...

2586878 2590213 ...so they could be fed intravenously
to the living.

2590757 2595010 And standing there,
facing the pure, horrifying precision...

2595261 2598180 ...I came to realize
the obviousness of the truth.

2606230 2609608 The Matrix is a computer-generated
dream world...
2614655 2617824 ...in order to change a human being...

2627502 2632088 I didn't say it would be easy, Neo.
I just said it would be the truth.
2636093 2638011 Let me out! I want out!

2639972 2642641 - Easy, Neo. Easy.
- Get this thing out of me.
2642892 2644559 Get this thing out of me!
2677468 2679261 I can't go back, can I?

2692191 2695443 We never free a mind
once it's reached a certain age.
2697405 2699114 The mind has trouble letting go.
2699365 2701658 I've seen it before, and I'm sorry.
2702702 2704786 I did what I did because...

2715381 2719467 When the Matrix was first built,
there was a man born inside...

2719969 2723763 ...who had the ability
to change whatever he wanted...
2724140 2727058 ...to remake the Matrix as he saw fit.
2728811 2732272 It was he who freed the first of us...
2736235 2739321 As long as the Matrix exists...
2739655 2741740 ...the human race will never be free.
